updates.update_userinfo: Message from the Founder & Refund Update!
updates.update_content:
Hello backers of CAMEO360,
Wishing you all a good 2018!
First, as the sole founder of CAMEO360, I have failed to deliver to the backers the CAMEO360 as promised. Second, I would like to address a big issue and misunderstanding a few backers has taken an unfair action towards another project creator. Third, I would like to address how I have been dealing with the situation to get backers back their pledges.

Greetings to all backers!  

We apologize for the delay of our updates and we want to ensure our backers our team is hard at work and doing our very best even with the unforeseen hurdles we have to face from bad weather to technical issues during our whole built.  
We would like to extend the good news on our progress as we continue our testing process with the CAMEO360. Our team has been very pleased the internal components have been stable and has presented very minimal issues to avoid more major delays. Durability testing is our most important stage to ensure longevity of product life for continuous use of our CAMEO360 users. In the next few weeks we will finally undergo testing of the CAMEO360 in public and share with all our backers the recording of our 4K video and quality of our 24 MP photos.

Greeting to all the backers,
We do apologize for one delay after another our team has experienced. Our team has been working hard and pushing to finish the last stage of the testing and development as required by our manufacturing partner. For the last 2 weeks, Hato typhoon hit southern China where Hong Kong and Macau was hit heavy with strong rain and flooding that caused offices and manufacturing to close and pause operation for safety reasons.

Greetings to all our Backers!
Our team and I would like to apologize for the delay of our updates and progress on our development. We have encountered a couple of small road blocks during our development, but have resolved the big issues and currently undergoing testing to get to the home stretch towards mass manufacturing the CAMEO360. We apologize the shipping date we anticipated for August 2017 will be delayed. We are working hard to avoid longer delays, but we are doing our best to make sure we balance out the task to make sure we deliver a superior product into the market.

Hi Backers,
The Flick Labs team has been hard at work to make our deadline for delivery this coming August. Making delivery on time is our top priority, but quality and reliability is a very important factor. The last 3 months has been a critical step for the testing of the Cameo360 to make sure it meets the quality and reliability we aim to bring to everyone.

Good day Kickstarter! 
First, we would like to thank our backers for your support and patience. Second, we apologize for our update took a bit longer. We finally finished the Flicksee App and currently in our final debugging stage. The camera software for the CAMEO360 is done with debugging on the way and we will be integrating the CAMEO360 camera features with the Flicksee App.

Hello everyone,
We apologize for the delay. Our team has been hard at work to make sure we meet the shipment date. We are both working on camera and the Flicksee App at the same time, so we were not able to address the correction as quick as possible. 
First, we would like to thank all the backers for your patience. We have address the issue with BackerKit and all Kickstarter backers can re-visit their surveys and make corrections to make sure you will not get charge extra shipping fee.

We would like to inform all our backers and apologize for the small error on our survey with Backerkit. Some of our backers that have add-ons with their pledges have noticed extra shipping charge after filling out their surveys. We will correct this mistake on the set-up of the surveys with Backerkit as soon as possible this coming week. We appreciate the support and your patience. Feel free to drop us a message and any questions you may have. Thank you.

Hello everyone,
We are back with more information for all of our backers. We would like to update all our backers we will be sending out surveys at the end of next week between May 4th to May 7th. 
We are working with BackerKit.com to ensure fulfillment is properly organized. We thank you for your patience as we are hard at work to make sure we are ahead of our set schedule to deliver your CAMEO360 on time.

Dear new and returning backers,
Thank you all for sticking with us. We received an outpouring of support from many of you. It inspired us and helped give us the confidence to relaunch.

We'll be in it until the end. Please continue to share the campaign with family and friends. We'll be forever grateful!
Project Link: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/himali/high-quality-mountain-apparel

updates.update_userinfo: Everest 2017 Video Update from our CoFounder
updates.update_content: A Video Update from our CoFounder's 2017 Everest Expedition:

updates.update_userinfo: Tendi is off to Mt. Everest!
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
Tendi Sherpa is off to his 14th season of guiding on Mt. Everest! April and May are considered "Everest climbing season". Typically, the best weather window is between May 15-30. Most climbers will aim to summit during this short window but must spend over a month on the mountain, slowly acclimating to the extreme altitude.
Kickstarter has chosen us as a "Project We Love". Thank you Kickstarter!

We are past the 10k mark! Thank you all!
We still have a long way to go but we've seen some amazing progress thus far. Many successful projects fund in the last hours. Similar to climbing a mountain, it will take confidence, strength, faith, and maybe even a stroke of luck. No doubt that it will be a group effort; If you're excited about our new line, we'd be forever grateful if you continue to share the project with friends and family on social media or by email.

campaign.story:
Herbert is changing how fresh food is grown. Making it possible for everyone to produce locally at home. The in-house developed LED technology and hydroponic system allow for optimal growth of your plants all year around. This way you can harvest up to 40% more.
Indoor farming has never been that simple, clean and beautiful. Create your own living and colorful picture on any wall. It is completely leak proof. Choose between a beechwood or poplar finish. 
 Featured in
Presskit or news@ponix-systems.at
 Watch Co-Founder Alex Penzias TEDx Talk:
  Herbert is a hydroponic vertical garden, which means that plants grow directly in water and no soil has to be used. This technology is also used by e.g. NASA for producing food crops on space exploration missions. This way planting needs less space, is clean and much more efficient. 
Step 1: Put a seed into one of our biodegradable sponges, which are also used by NASA, and place the sponge in a little pot.
Step 2: Place the pot in Herbert, put one of our special seed caps on it until you can see a little seedling sprouting. Up to 15 plants can grow at the same time. 
Step 3: Add water and organic fertilizer.
Step 4: Watch your delicious salads, herbs and fruits grow.
     We've tested and analyzed various systems that are available on the market. There are many low cost countertop solutions but all of them lack the energy and size to be really productive.
Therefore, we created a true vertical farm with a strong LED light to save you space and let you grow, even in the coldest of winters. You can easily set the time when the light should be switched on and off. 
Our specialized designers and prototype engineers put a lot of effort into designing a unique system, that saves you space while producing tasty and colorful vegetables, herbs, and fruits like strawberries faster compared to anything else available. 
40% faster compared to traditional farming methods. You can grow a fresh head of lettuce within 4-5 weeks compared to 2-3 months. Making it possible to harvest 80-90 lettuce heads each year – every 4 to 5 days one!
  Growing at home gives you full transparency of your food. You know what is in it: no GMO, no pesticides, no herbicides, all fresh and organic. Harvest it when you need it. This way you can reduce your food waste too. 
These are some examples of greens that we offer to grow in Herbert. Herbert comes with a starter kit which includes 30 sponges, seeds and fertilizer. More sponges and seeds can be easily delivered to your home. 
           Our free app for Android and iOS will guide you through the growing process and will allow you to adjust the light settings to suit your needs. 
                     Herbert: 
Materials: Front: beechwood or poplar wood finish; Frame: white powder coated aluminium plate; Growing Modules: food safe Polypropylen (PP) 
Space for up to 15 plants 
Total weight (including light, water and plants): 12 kg/ 26,5 lbs 
Measurement: 820 x 560 x 115 mm/ 32.3 x 22.0 x 4.5 inches 
Patent pending 
Included Power adapter: 110Volt/230Volt 
LED Light 
28 high quality LEDs 
60 Watt 
special developed light concepts enable best growth 
Measurement: 200 x 300 x 500 mm/ 2.8 x 11.8 x 19.7 inches 
App
Available for iOS and Android for free
Low energy Bluetooth connection 
             The Team
Since 2014 Alexander Penzias and Alvaro Lobato-Jimenez are working on combining modern, smart technology with hydroponics to minimize the land, water and energy used in farming. Our ultimate goal is to make indoor farming simple, clean and enable everyone to do it at home. For three years we have been installing and optimizing hydroponic systems for restaurants and offices. Now we want to turn everyone’s thumb green with Herbert!
Testimonial
In 2016 we installed this 10m² beautiful customized hydroponic system at top chef Leo Wrenkh's restaurant and cooking class studio. The Wrenkh family well known as vegetarian food pioneers, have their restaurant hearted in the city center of Vienna. 
     The Development
We have been working on Herbert for almost two years to make this product as easy to use and as clean and safe to work with, as possible. With our team of experts in their respective fields we have developed something new and beautiful, a product that will change your food consumption tremendously. 
We have our suppliers and production partners ready to produce in the required quality and quantity. To guarantee quality and shorten communication channels we decided to fully rely on European partners, mainly in Austria and Hungary. After the last adjustments for mass production after the campaign has finished, we are looking forward to start production in July 2017. 
We are here not just to pre-sell Herbert, but rather to expand our passionate community of urban farmers. We believe that you play an integral role in the development of Herbert. By supporting us you help to build the basis for the next generation of food production. Because we want to engrain food farming into our everyday lives. 
If you are ready to join this exciting journey with us, please support our campaign and spread the word! A few clicks for you make a big difference for us.
                                     Dein ganz persönlicher, vertikaler Garten für frisches, biologisches Essen. Chilis, Minze, Basilikum, Erdbeeren und vieles mehr. Du bestimmst was in Herbert wächst.
Herbert verändert wie unsere Lebensmittel angebaut werden. Er macht es jedem möglich, Zuhause an den eigenen vier Wänden Essen zu produzieren. Durch die eigens entwickelte LED Technologie und das hydroponische System, bei der die Pflanzenwurzeln direkt in Wasser, ganz ohne Erde, wachsen, können die Pflanzen unter optimalen Bedingungen gedeihen. Dies ermöglicht bis zu 40% mehr Ertrag im Vergleich zum traditionellen Anbau auf gleicher Fläche.
Gemüseanbau war noch nie so einfach, sauber und schön, und dabei komplett auslaufsicher. Kreiere dein eigenes, lebendiges und farbenfrohes Bild. Die Frontplatte aus Holz ist wahlweise in Buche oder Pappel verfügbar.
Gesehen in
  Herbert ist ein hydroponischer vertikaler Garten, der mit LEDs beleuchtet wird. Die Pflanzen wurzeln direkt in Wasser, auf den Einsatz von Erde haben wir verzichtet. Auch die NASA vertraut auf dieses Prinzip, damit sie auf Raumfahrtmissionen Lebensmittel produzieren können. So braucht der Anbau deutlich weniger Platz, ist absolut sauber und viel effizienter.
Schritt 1: Lege einen Samen in einen unserer biologisch abbaubaren Schwämmen, welche auch von der NASA verwendet werden, und gib den Schwamm in den kleinen Netztopf.
Schritt 2: Lege den Netztopf in eine der Öffnungen von Herbert ein und setzte eine unserer speziellen Anzuchtkapseln darauf, solange bis der Samen sprießt und du einen Keimling sehen kannst. So können bis zu 15 Pflanzen gleichzeitig angebaut werden.
Schritt 3: Fülle Wasser und den flüssigen, bio mineralischen Dünger in den Tank.
Schritt 4: Schau deinen köstlichen Salaten, Kräutern und Früchten beim Wachsen zu.
     Wir haben zahlreiche, am Markt erhältliche Systeme getestet und analysiert. Es gibt einige günstigere Lösungen für die Küchenarbeitsplatte, aber allen fehlt die notwendige Energie und Größe um wirklich produktiv bei größtmöglicher Platzersparnis zu sein.
Aus diesem Grund haben wir eine echte, vertikale Farm mit einer eigenen LED Beleuchtung entwickelt um dir Platz zu sparen und den Anbau auch im kältesten Winter zu ermöglichen. Stelle die Beleuchtungszeit und -intensität so ein, wie es dir und deinen Pflanzen am besten passt.
Unsere Designer und Techniker haben hart daran gearbeitet, ein einzigartiges Design zu entwickeln, das gleichzeitig Platz spart und köstliche frische Salate, Kräuter und Früchte in einem für daheim noch nie da gewesenen Tempo heranwachsen lässt.

Im Vergleich zum traditionellen Anbau ermöglicht Herbert bis zu 40% mehr Ernte auf gleicher Fläche. So ist ein Salatkopf bereits nach 4-5 Wochen, anstatt 2-3 Monaten, essreif. Jährlich können so 80-90 Salatköpfe geerntet werden: alle 4-5 Tage einer!
Der eigene Anbau ermöglicht dir die volle Transparenz über dein Essen. Du weißt was du isst: keine genmanipulierten Pflanzen, keine Pestizide, keine Herbizide, alles frisch und biologisch. Produziere und ernte nach deinem eigenen Bedarf und verringere so deine Lebensmittelabfälle.
Hier ist eine Auflistung unseres Sortiments, das wir bereits mehrfach getestet haben. Zu deinem Herbert bekommst du ein Starter-Kit: dieses inkludiert 30 Schwämme, Samen und Flüssigdünger. Für einen größeren Komfort liefern wir dir weitere Schwämme, Samen und Dünger direkt nach Hause.
          Unsere gratis App für Android und iOS begleitet dich beim Anbauprozess und erlaubt dir die Lichteinstellungen so zu verändern, dass sie dich und deine Pflanzen glücklich macht.
    Herbert:
Materialien: Frontplatte: Buchenholz und Pappelholz; Rahmen: pulverbeschichtete Aluminiumplatte; Anzuchtmodule: lebensmittelechtes Polypropylen (PP)
Platz für bis zu 15 Pflanzen
Gesamtgewicht (inkl. Licht, Wasser und Pflanzen): 12kg
Maße: 820 x 560 x 115 mm
Eine Patent wurde eingereicht
Stromanschluss inkludiert - 110V/230V
LED-Lampe:
28 qualitative, hochwertige LEDs
60 Watt
Speziell entwickelte Beleuchtungskonzepte für das optimale Wachstum
Maße: 200 x 300 x 500 mm
App
Gratis erhältlich für iOS und Android
Bluethooth Low Energy Verbindung
                           Das Team
Seit 2014 arbeiten Alexander Penzias und Alvaro Lobato-Jimenez daran, die Lebensmittelproduktion in unseren Alltag integrieren. Sie kombinieren die eigens entwickelte LED Technologie mit modernen hydroponischen Systemen, um so Land-, Wasser- und Energieverbrauch effizienter zu gestalten. Seit drei Jahren bauen und optimieren sie hydroponische Anlagen für Restaurants und Büros. Sie wollen indoor farming einfach, sauber und für jeden daheim zugänglich machen. Mit Herbert kann jeder, auch ohne grünen Daumen, sein eigenes Gemüse züchten.
 Testimonial
2016 haben wir eine 10m² große, maßgeschneiderte hydroponische Anlage im Szene Restaurant und Kochsalon Wrenkh installiert. Das Restaurant der Familie Wrenkh, bekannt als vegetarische Pioniere, hat ihr Lokal im Herzen Wiens.
  Über die Entwicklung
Seit  zwei Jahren arbeiten wir daran Herbert so einfach, sauber, bedienungsfreundlich und sicher zu machen, wie möglich. Mit unserem Team von Experten aus unterschiedlichen Fachgebieten haben wir etwas neues und wunderschönes entwickelt. Ein Produkt, dass den Zugang zu Lebensmitteln verändert.
Unsere Zulieferer und Fertigungspartner können in der von uns gewünschten Qualität und Quantität liefern. Um diese Qualität garantieren zu können und um Kommunikationskanäle möglichst kurz zu halten setzen wir auf europäische Partner, hauptsächlich aus Österreich und Ungarn. Nach den letzten Optimierungen vor der Massenproduktion und nach Ende der Kampagne wird die Produktion im Juli 2017 starten.
 Wir sind hier um unsere leidenschaftliche indoor farming Gemeinschaft zu erweitern. Wir glauben daran, dass du einen wesentlichen Beitrag zur Entwicklung von Herbert liefern kannst. Mit deiner Unterstützung legen wir gemeinsam den Grundstein für eine neue Art derNahversorgung. Wir integrieren die Lebensmittelproduktion wieder in unser Alltag.
 Wenn du uns auf unserer Reise begleiten möchtest, unterstütze bitte unser Projekt und erzähle deinen Freunden davon! Ein kleiner Klick für dich macht einen großen Unterschied für uns.
        Additional Notes  
Please note that shipping to any country outside the European Union may be delayed or canceled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. There may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You may need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This product is designed from the bottom up taking into account scalability in production quantities, simple manufacturing steps, aesthetics, as well as functionality while also producing as locally as we can. We have conducted various plant growing tests to optimize growing conditions in Herbert.

Unforeseen events may occur and cannot always be completely mitigated. However, we are working together with a large network of experts, as well as other hardware startups who have launched successful campaigns in the past and who are happy to share their experiences with us. 

The challenges that we face are:

Certification Process
Herbert will be sold in North America, Europe, and other selected countries. This means that Herbert has to adhere to, e.g., CE and UL certifications, among others. Out of its inherent complexity, the certification process can potentially require more time than expected.

Software Development
We have developed an application that allows you to control the light settings of Herbert via your smartphone. However, developing software and testing can take time. Therefore, we are working together with experienced developers only.

Manufacturing and Supply Chain
To be able to produce Herbert in the highest possible quality whilst keeping scalability and affordability in mind, we require various production tools for injection molding, deep drawing, and extrusion processes. The level of complexity and interdependendcy of some parts may lead to unforeseen delays during supply chain and production optimization.

Plant Harvest
Growing plants means you are dealing with living organisms that cannot be fully controlled. Germination, yield, and time to harvest may vary from time to time.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear Backers and Supporters,
we are back again with a brief update. We hope that you all had a relaxing Christmas and that you already had a successful start into the new year. 
We are still alive and we are still working on assembly and the next batch will be shipped soon.

Dear all, 
we are happy to announce that the first batch of Herberts has been picked up and is on the way! We look forward to the first of our supporters receiving their Herbert and we are eager to hear from your experiences!  
We are going according to backer numbers and from now on we will continue with assembly and shipping on a weekly basis. From this point on it should take approximately 2 months altogether until all Herberts are shipped to each and everyone of you. The customized orders within the Herbert packages (seed starter kits, extra seeds and/or extra sponge packs) have already been commissioned and Herberts are being assembled, added to the packages accordingly, and then being shipped.

Dear backers,
another month has passed, and we hope you enjoyed your summer holidays. We have a new update for you, read below.
Shipment 
First Herberts shall be shipped on September 17th! Within the next two months all Herberts should be sent out to every backer.

Dear urban gardeners, 
in the last few weeks we have been in the middle of gathering and putting everything together. There are still a few hurdles left to overcome, but they are small and will be done quickly. The highlights are below. This will be the second to last update before we start with the shipping of the first units. We will post another update with pictures of assembly in the following weeks, the next update will be posted when shipping starts!

updates.update_userinfo: Winter is coming – and so is Herbert!
updates.update_content: As we have mentioned at the beginning of last week, this is a short mini-update, here are pictures of the assembly stations where we have started assembly for the frames and the LED lights.

Dear urban gardeners,
we hope the hot weather didn’t kill all your balcony plants! But soon Herbert will keep most of them alive anyhow. Below you have the final pieces of news from our side:
Certification

updates.update_userinfo: We are almost there! Assembly and stretch goal update
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
We have a shorter yet overall positive update for you. 
After the successful pre-certification, the official EMC certification is currently under way. Based on the pre-certification outcome, we expect positive outcomes. The results are expected to come in in about one or two weeks.

Finally Herbert arrived!!! Thank you very much for making it happen. Happy new year

Well, I am underwhelmed so far. It is kind of awesome to see plants grow in a Herbert, but my initial test - into which I intentionally didn't go full-throttle - revealed a big downside already. Apparently there is no other way than to go full-throttle with the Herbert. I decided to go for three pods initially. Unfortunately, since Ponix did not offer blind covers for one or even two rows, this meant that not all holes could be covered. And even out of those that could be covered in a fashion that would guarantee that the holes would be covered and light kept out, are a brittle solution. These "lids" fall off at the slightest disturbance. Anyway, long story short: ALGAE are blossoming. I meant for other plants to grow ... and they do, but algae are also blossoming thanks to the inability to cover all unused holes and keep the light out. So apparently the whole Herbert will now have to undergo the maintenance cycle described in the manual. Personally I consider it kind of a negligence that the use case of using only one or two of the three rows is so badly supported, but there's nothing I can do other than attempting to find a 3D scanner and a 3D printer to create such a cover myself. After all the one thing that helps the algae blossoming that would be a factor we could avoid (other than the nutrients and water) is the light ...

One of the Ponix folks got in touch with me via email (which I only saw yesterday). I had received a letter with ten more (opaque) covers which in fact prompted me to look for an email (which my automated filters had stashed away in a subfolder). Thanks for that.
The STL files can be found here: https://www.thingiverse.com/thing:3320267

Hey Guys! I'm a big supporter but please allow me some space for criticism. Kickstarter is a great platform for guys like you who are passionate about introducing new cool things to the world and at the same time it is great for me - the baker - who loves to explore and support new ideas. About the pricing - I've seen that you're running a "Cyber Monday" flash sale (which is absolutely fine 'cause who wouldn't run a promotion during such an economically strong time of the year). HOWEVER, I don't like the fact that non-bakers get the chance to purchase Herbert even cheaper than the "Early Bird" perk options (369€ Early Bird Perk vs. 349€ Black Friday Price). I mean we're very patient in regards to the final delivery date etc. and we were the ones allowing you to realize this amazing product - so please be respectful and don't make us bakers look as fools by selling Herber below your Kickstarter Campaign prices... Cheers, Philipp.

campaign.story:
Have you ever struggled with Productivity, Discipline & FOCUS? 
You're not alone.
Are you busy all day long but have little to show for it?
I have a little secret for you...
We ALL struggle with productivity, discipline and focus. 
The problem is, these skills are CRITICAL to success in both business and life.
Allow me to introduce the solution:
The Mastery Journal
Your step-by-step guide to mastering productivity, discipline & focus in 100 days.
   
My business (EOFire) has evolved into a multi-million dollar a year business, but I struggled for YEARS.
My days often looked like this:
AH-HA moments struck like lightning bolts! 
I’d imagine my future success and the impact it would have on my life. 
I'd bask in the glow of this 'future' success. 
I’d sit on the idea for a couple days, and then life would take over. 
Slowly but surely I'd lose momentum and the idea would wither and die.
Nothing would happen, and my life would go on as before.
After experiencing this circle of failure for years, I learned how to master productivity, discipline and focus.
Now, AH-HA moments withering on the vine is a thing of the past.
My most recent AH-HA moment was to create a guide to help others master productivity, discipline and focus.
The Mastery Journal was born, and I'm FIRED UP to be sharing it with you today! 
In the video below, JLD will walk you through the contents of The Mastery Journal!
  PLAY

 
The #1 Frustration for Entrepreneurs?
Maintaining the discipline and focus required to be productive. 
Bad ideas are not the reason Entrepreneurs fail.
Entrepreneurs fail because of a lack of execution.
The Mastery Journal will guide you step-by-step in EXECUTING your plan of action.
Simply put, The Mastery Journal is an accountability partner that won’t let you fail! 
   
I’ve interviewed 1500+ successful and inspiring Entrepreneurs.
All 1500, myself included, struggle to maintain discipline and focus throughout the day.
We’re only human after all!
The Mastery Journal is your key to overcoming that struggle & beginning your journey to success!  
        Morning routine: The Mastery Journal will get your day off to the right start.
Four daily sessions: Timed sessions where you have ONE focus.
Daily self-evaluation: Evaluating your strengths & weaknesses is critical to your success. 
10-day recaps: Amplify what’s working, adjust what’s not, and establish your 10 day productivity and discipline scores. 
Win tomorrow today: End each day knowing how you are going to WIN tomorrow. 
Daily affirmations: Positive mindset is KEY.
Inspiring Quotes: Hand-picked quotes from JLD to inspire you daily. 
and SO much more... 
   
Here’s your opportunity to follow a proven plan to IGNITE your day & INSPIRE your life
Momentum is hard to attain.
The good news?
Once you’ve attained a little momentum, achieving success becomes easier.
The Mastery Journal will IGNITE your momentum, and the sky's the limit!
   
It’s time to:
Invest in yourself…
Invest in your future...
Invest in The Mastery Journal!
   
Self-Evaluation
Tracking your productivity can be tedious and repetitive, which is why we've included self-evaluation sections designed to keep you motivated and engaged.
With four focused daily sessions, nightly preparation and 10-day recaps, a dramatic boost in your productivity, discipline and focus is a mere 100 days away!
   
 The Success Pack!
   
The Mastery Journal + The Freedom Journal
In 2016, we launched The Freedom Journal, a step-by-step guide to accomplishing your #1 goal in 100 days.
In preparing to launch The Mastery Journal we received many versions of the question:
How do The Mastery Journal and The Freedom Journal work together?
So glad you asked! 
The Freedom Journal will guide you in accomplishing your #1 goal in 100 days. The Mastery Journal will guide you in mastering productivity, discipline and focus in 100 days!
   
While both are valuable on their own, we know the two combined will be incredibly powerful, so we’ve created an exclusive SUCCESS pack to offer you both journals together! 
 
  The Mastery Journal Community
   
Exclusive Facebook Community
By backing The Mastery Journal Kickstarter campaign at the $27 level or higher you'll gain access to our exclusive and private Facebook Community where you'll receive support and guidance from John Lee Dumas and other amazing Entrepreneurs who are rocking The Mastery Journal, The Freedom Journal, and in some cases, BOTH!
You’ll be able to brainstorm with a team of like-minded Entrepreneurs who will help you stay on track while mastering productivity and working toward your #1 goal.
Spread the Love!
Will you help us spread the word about The Mastery Journal?
Click the image below to share, and we'll send you a 30-day fillable PDF of The Mastery Journal as a thank you! 
      John Lee Dumas (JLD) is the host of EOFire, a top-ranked Podcast where he interviews today's most successful Entrepreneurs 7 days a week! 
JLD has grown EOFire into a multi-million dollar a year business with over 1500 interviews to date and over 1.5 million monthly listens. Find out more about John and his team over at EOFire.com
   
A note from JLD:  
I have a LOT of weaknesses - far too many to name here.
My strengths are limited, but they are where I choose to focus my time and energy.
Productivity, discipline and focus are my three greatest strengths and the reason I've been able to build EOFire into a multi-million dollar a year business.
I created The Mastery Journal to guide others in mastering these three skills, and I hope you’ll invest the time and energy in yourself to do so.
Prepare to IGNITE!
~ JLD
   
It's been a crazy ride since I launched EOFire on September 22nd of 2012. People I admired from afar have become friends (see above) and opportunities are plentiful.
With the thousands of conversations I've had with successful Entrepreneurs, I've witnessed firsthand the power of accountability.
The Mastery Journal is an accountability partner that won’t let you fail.
   
As an Officer in the Army, I learned the power of discipline. Tasks WILL expand to the time you allot. In the Army, we always had deadlines. YOUR deadline? 100 days!
Whether you're an Athlete, Entrepreneur, Musician, or (fill in the blank)... becoming more productive with your time is a KEY component to your success. Let The Mastery Journal provide the tools and the accountability you need to accomplish your life dreams!
I look forward to hearing YOUR story about how you mastered productivity, discipline and focus in 100 days, and the impact it has made on your life.

campaign.story:
The Smart Garden 9 is a meticulously designed, self-growing garden that revolutionizes how fresh food is grown. 
From crisp kale and spicy chilli to sweet strawberry and calming mint, this self-growing garden helps all plants thrive, automatically making sure they have the right amounts of water, light, oxygen, and nutrients. With healthy foods grown right on your windowsill, you can enjoy a higher quality of life 24/7.
Most people don’t have a backyard or the time to garden. But does this mean they should have to forgo quality for the spray-covered, “fresh” food supermarkets offer? We don't think so (and neither, we’re betting, do you!) 
The Smart Garden comes in three colours.
    Our system is the easiest indoor gardening solution on the market, and it involves far less noise than the hydroponic systems. All you have to do is fill the water tank, plug the garden in and boom! - the Smart Garden 9 takes it from there.
Using the garden is as easy as 1-2-3
With more than 7 years of R&D under our belts, we've spent a long time developing the backbone of our gardens: The Smart Soil. This 100% safe, nanotech material supplies plant roots with the right amount of oxygen, water and nutrients at all times. It's no regular soil, but a material that breathes with the plant and evenly disperses air and water mixture based on the plant's needs.  Made of natural materials, the Smart Soil is biodegradable.
The Click & Grow Smart Soil
  Our Smart Gardens are neither hydroponic nor aeroponic, but use a completely unique technology that grows food without using pesticides, herbicides or any other harmful substances.
Faster growth without any harmful substances
    “The single greatest lesson the garden teaches is that our relationship to the planet need not be zero-sum … [we can] provide for ourselves without diminishing the world.” -Michael Pollan
This quote by the renowned journalist Michael Pollan hints at why so many things are wrong with today’s food industry. Increasing urbanization has distanced us from nature and the knowledge of how to grow food sustainably. We at Click & Grow want to change this.
Part of the Click & Grow team
With our Smart Gardens, you can easily get back to growing your own food and stop buying into the waste (of energy, resources, harvests, and more) that defines corporate farming.
  The Smart Garden 9 is small enough to perfectly fit any apartment, yet big enough to transform the way you eat.
Grow anything from tomatoes and parsley to trees and flowers with your Smart Garden 9. Mix and match the wide variety of plants we offer to find the combination that’s right for you.
Just a few of the available refills for the Smart Garden 9
  Click & Grow is the only technology that reduces the moisture level in the root zone in a very controlled manner, and thereby uses water stress to increase bioactive compounds (antioxidants) in plants. By doing this, we've been able to raise the percentage of antioxidants in some of our plants by almost 600% that of store-bought alternatives. Keep in mind - this is done without using any chemicals or fertilisers! Our system is completely safe and clean.
The Smart Garden 9 in Grey
The antioxidants found in our plants, such as vitamin C, vitamin A and rosmarinic acid, are widely used in dietary supplements and have been shown to help prevent cancer, coronary heart disease, and even altitude sickness. Basically, the more antioxidants of different natural sources you consume, the better your health. 
      The Smart Garden 9 in Grey
Our technology is not only more sustainable than the current food production practices, but it also grows plants faster and helps them attain superior antioxidant levels. Instead of using the messy pumps, mixers, filters, nutrient applicators, etc. of other indoor gardening systems, we use simple materials and nanotechnology to help you get better results effortlessly.  
  Get better results sustainably
    Drawing upon material and plant science, our technology optimizes plant's growth cycles by carefully monitoring the factors that affect their growth on a micro level. This means we can keep pH, aeration, moisture, and nutrition right where the plants need them to be without relying on the expensive mechanical control systems of hydroponics.
THE SOIL. We've worked long and hard to create our Smart Soil, and thanks to this unique, patented nanomaterial, our Smart Gardens don’t need expensive sensors, pumps and filtering systems.
The Smart Soil
THE WATERING. Our advanced watering system uses safe sensors to continually distribute the perfect amount of water to each plant. This keeps your seedlings happy and healthy at all times. All you need to do is fill your Smart Garden’s water tank once every two months.
The lamps offer perfect hues to support photosynthesis
 THE LIGHTING. The lights used in the Smart Garden 9 reduce light pollution through the use of highly transparent optics. The garden’s lamp mimics nature’s most efficient photosynthesis peaks and maintains a healthy and natural environment for the plants. Better yet, the Smart Garden 9 features new OSRAM LEDs that offer maximal efficiency and the perfect spectra for photosynthesis. This means faster growth, a bigger yield, and less waste.
Are Smart Gardens connected to the internet or cloud?  
There's a specific reason we didn't make this a connected product. Do you really need a 500$ garden kit with an app that allows you to turn the lights on and off? We didn't think so. We don't want to offer you a fun gadget, but a garden that will grow you fresh food. And this is exactly what the Smart Garden 9 is. The lights will be on, plants watered and nutritious even when the AI's finally take over the internet.
The Smart Garden 9 in white
                                      After successfully launching our second generation product on Kickstarter three years ago, we’re thrilled to present this new creation to the community that first helped us take off. 
Today, more than 350 000 people have Click & Grow gardens, and in 2015 we asked these folks what they’d like to see from us next. More than 80% of respondents said they wanted to be able to grow more food, and more than 60% said nine plants would be the ideal size. Since we had so much support and love from the Kickstarter community when launching our previous product - the Smart Herb Garden -, we wanted to give you the first opportunity to get the Smart Garden 9!
        Measurements: 23in x 5.5in x 11in / 59cm x 14cm x 28cm
Weight: 5,3 lb / 2,4kg
Growing capacities: 9 plants
Warranty: 1 year
Automatic watering
Watering tank: 1,45 gallons/ 5,5 liters
10 LEDs; 10 000 lux
Over 35 different pre-seeded plant capsules with fruits, herbs, salads and flowers + plant your own seeds in the experimental seedless capsules
Subscriptions available (get up to 30% off retail price)
Fruits: Mini Tomato, Wild Strawberry, Chili Pepper, Sweet Paprika, Chillies, Physalis 
Herbs: Basil, Thai Basil, Red Basil, Dwarf Basil, Parsley, Peppermint, Lemon Balm, Stevia, Thyme, Chives, Oregano, Sage, Catnip, Hyssop, Dill, Garlic Chives, Coriander, Garden Cress
Salad Greens: Leaf Mustard, Bloody Sorrel, Red Oak Leaf Lettuce, Green Lettuce, Frillice, Butterhead Salad, Bok Choy, Leaf-Beet, Kale, Komatsuna
Flowers: Mimosa, Petunia, French Marigold, Moss Rose, Lavender, Sweet Alyssum, Busy Lizzie, Cockscomb, Painted Nettle 
Grow Anything refill: Seedless smart soil, grow any plant you want
The Smart Garden 9 is available for US and all EU countries, Canada, Iceland, Norway, Andorra, San Marino, Switzerland, Liechtenstein, Monaco, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan and Macau. 
Shipping is free for US, a shipping fee of 10 $ applies to Europe and Canada and 15$ for Hong Kong, Malaysia, Taiwan, Macau and Singapore.
We can't offer shipping to other regions due to strict seed and soil import laws many countries have, but we're definitely working our hardest towards making this product available for everyone. 
  Please find high-resolution images HERE.
Contact press@clickandgrow.com for additional information.
There's still a chance to get a good price!
  Refer to a friend and get a discount!

updates.update_userinfo: We've started shipping out your Smart Garden 9's
updates.update_content:
Dear backers, 
your gardens have reached local warehouses and we've started shipping them out.

Dear backers,
As discussed in our previous updates we encountered some problems with our initial logistics partner and had to switch the means of delivery from plane to maritime transport. This unfortunately caused serious delays to our delivery schedule. All products left manufacturing on 28th of July and we asked for a 9-12 week window for them to be delivered to your homes. We hope we've managed to inform all of you by now and no one is in the dark about this. Again, we apologise and thank you for being so understanding!

updates.update_userinfo: The survey is closed: Here's what's going to happen next!
updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
The survey is officially closed and all your preferences and orders have been processed. So many of you took advantage of the add-on options and stocked up on additional plants and starter kit's. Your enthusiasm to test and grow so many different plants truly inspires us to keep going!
The most chosen/popular plants were Mini Tomato, Wild Strawberry, Cilantro and Basil. The most popular colour of the Smart Garden 9 starter kit was Grey. Thank you for indicating your preferences and helping us move to the next stage of our campaign.

updates.update_userinfo: 2 NEW PLANTS AVAILABLE + survey deadline extended
updates.update_content:
Dear Click & Growers, 
Part of our R&D team just today got back from our manufacturing partner and we couldn't keep the progress to ourselves. So here's a completely spontaneous update from us! We're extremely pleased with the progress so far and how the hardware is looking, here's a sneak peak of the production process and manufacturing:

Hi, Click & Growers! 
We're back today with the last update before you'll receive the survey (where we ask you to indicate the colour and plant preferences of your gardens and share shipping addresses).
However, the topic of today's update is very close to our hearts and will hopefully serve as a thank you for everyone who helped us make the Smart Garden 9 come to life (you guys!).

updates.update_userinfo: IMPORTANT: Issues with delivery and an update on the survey
updates.update_content:
Hi, Click & Growers!
We've just received the first samples from production and are happy to share them with you. Although some details still need fine-tuning, we're very happy with the quality of the materials and detailing. We've forwarded our feedback to the manufacturer and are already awaiting t2 samples!

Dear Click & Growers,
We've been pushing ourselves hard to keep this project on track and now we're back with a few updates on the development of your Smart Garden 9:
Molds are finalised 
Lamp electronic circuit board tests are finalised and passed secondary tests as well

campaign.story:
For professionals and beginners alike, warming up, recovering, and self-massage has *never* been more convenient than with the FIT Roller. Save time and enhance your rolling experience with this 4-in-1 roller.
The ‘Fire & Ice Therapy’ team knows how busy your schedule is and how your warm-ups and cool-downs will be the first to take a hit when you need to get a workout in.
Even if you've never warmed up, cooled down, or used a roller in your life, this simple-to-use tool will let you stay loose and ache-free for longer... and may reduce the need for extra equipment or expensive therapies.
PLAY

See why Josh Lambo prefers Fire & Ice Therapy!
PLAY

See why Former D1 Quarterback prefers Fire & Ice Therapy
PLAY

         New to Kickstarter? Watch this video on how to back the campaign!
Giveaway Winner Announced!
Congratulations to James Hendrix! You won a free FIT Roller! We will reach out to you directly.
Thank you to everyone that participated!

updates.update_content:
First, we want to thank you for your continued support! To show our gratitude, we have a sale starting Black Friday through Cyber Monday! Use the coupon code KSPUBLIC to get 10% off all our products on either the Fire & Ice Therapy website and on Amazon!
We also like to introduce... The F.I.T. Ball! The F.I.T. Ball has the ability to get hot or cold within seconds and helps those hard-to-reach muscles. We also created a Deluxe Package which includes The F.I.T. Roller, The F.I.T. Ball and our extra-convenient stand that helps you roll in place. Both of these are available on the  and on !

updates.update_userinfo: New Products and Black Friday Sale!
updates.update_content:
Many of you have already received your F.I.T. Rollers and we’ve loved the pictures you’ve sent showing them off. Keep it up!
But if you have not yet received your F.I.T. Roller, odds are you haven’t filled out your survey and given us your address. We need you to do this now because we’re excited to get you what you paid for! You can find the survey on the F.I.T. Roller Kickstarter page. Feel free to reach out to us with any questions.

Hey Fit Fam!
We have received the rollers and begun the shipping process! Though we have hundreds of orders, each is processed one at a time. It’s hard work but the Fire & Ice Therapy team has been dedicated to getting them to you as quickly as possible. In fact, we believe the last of the rollers will be in the mail in the next couple days.

Hey FIT Fam!
We are finally nearing the end of this campaign. Soon, the rollers will be at the warehouse and ready to ship to you. Although it all took a little longer than originally expected, we are ecstatic that you will soon be among the FIRST EVER to be able to ROLL with either HOT or COLD temperatures! This journey has had its challenges but we did not let them overshadow our excitement to bring you the most durable and innovative self-massage device on the market. We cannot express enough how grateful we are that you supported us along the way and remained patient as we worked through the kinks. We have all persevered together. We did it!

They're on their way!
Great news, Fit Fam!
The FIT Rollers have left the manufacturer and are on the open sea even now on their way to our fulfillment center! They will reach us in a few weeks and begin shipping the week of June 12th! They will be delivered to the address you most recently provided us.

updates.update_userinfo: The FIT Rollers have left the manufacturer!
updates.update_content:
Hey, Fit Fam! 
It’s April, the weather is warming and soon you will be, too! Or cooling down if you prefer. The FIT Roller will help you warm up, cool down and relax your muscles. Your patience and support is dearly appreciated by us and will be rewarded very soon. 
Every day brings us closer to the awaited delivery of the FIT Roller next month. Thank you to everyone who has reached out with their continued support and excitement as we’ve developed this product. In just a few weeks you’ll be holding your very own FIT Roller. We’ll make sure to let you know when the FIT Rollers have begun shipping. In the meantime reach out with any and all questions. Until then…

updates.update_userinfo: The FIT Roller is shipping shortly!
updates.update_content:
Hey FIT Fam,
I just wanted to reach out and thank you for your patience. 
We have officially begun the manufacturing process! In fact, we should be receiving samples for final approval very soon. There's been so much learning involved, details that I couldn't imagine before. Yet at every turn I know we're moving in the right direction. Every step makes me more excited than I was in the beginning.

campaign.story:
Grippz Mats are the only acupressure yoga mats that incorporates ergonomically designed ‘knobs’, which trigger acupressure points on your hands and feet providing the full benefits of acupressure and reflexology while adding extra grip during your yoga practice.
        Acupressure is an eastern healing art that uses fingers to gradually press key healing points. It relieves energy blockages, eases muscle tension, and promotes blood circulation.
The energy flow in your body affects everything — how you feel, how you think, and how you breathe. Pressing into the healing points stimulate your body’s innate way of healing itself and improves your overall health. 
Using an acupressure mat is one of the most effective ways to relax, deal with muscle tension, and improve sleep. Instead of fingers, the mat uses pressure knobs to press the same healing points on your body.
    Our acupressure points are firm enough to provide effective acupressure therapy, but soft enough for even your most complex flows.
The points also give extra grip surface, decreasing any chance of slipping during your practice.
Enhance your performance, reduce slipping and injuries, and enjoy the health benefits of acupressure and reflexology.
    Grippz Mats are closed-cell. The mats won’t absorb water or sweat and won’t develop odors over time.
    Eco-friendly. Non-toxic. High durability results in fewer yoga mats in the landfill dumps, making Grippz Mats a safe choice for the environment overall. This is a yoga mat that will last you for years.
        Grippz Mats was formed from a passion for eastern medicine and a desire to spread holistic healing to the world. Katrina, founder and CEO of Grippz Mats, is a trained acupuncturist and former yoga instructor.
One day, Katrina woke up with her face sagging and frozen in place. The doctors eventually diagnosed her with Lyme Disease and said half of her body would be paralyzed for the rest of her life. But she refused to give in. She used her training and knowledge to self-heal her body.
Through natural and holistic processes, Katrina was healed. It was then that she knew she had to spread the knowledge and capability of Eastern medicine to our western society. An idea came to her to combine her yoga practices with acupressure, and so Grippz Mats was born!
    We've been working on Grippz Mats for the past year. It's been a long road and we’re extremely excited to introduce this revolutionary acupressure yoga mat to the world.
In order to get the costs to a price we believe creates value for our customers, we need to have a large initial production run. Your support will allow us to place our first large order with our manufacturers so that we can reduce production costs and get Grippz Mats in the hands of people everywhere.

First of all, I know I can't begin to understand the magnitude of crazy that must be involved with trying to grow a company. I think kickstarter makes it great for companies to get money, but it's got to be rife with unexpected snags, which leads to disgruntled backers, etc. Lots of people were upset having to pay extra shipping, but I just figured that was one of those unexpected things that happens when a new company is trying to meet the demands of an unprecedented number of backers/customers. Anyway, so I get it, and I believe I've been pretty patient. Anyway, this morning, I received the two mats that I ordered, but did not receive the travel bag. No worries. I'm sure the bag will come later. But I was very disappointed in the mats themselves. They look nothing like the ones in the video. The ones shown in the video looked to be nearly 1/2 an inch thick, with acupressure points that looked at least 1/4 inch in diameter at their bases. The mat on the video looked squishy and comfortable. This mat is a little more than 1/16 of in inch thick, and the acupressure points are 1/8 of an inch at their bases. The bottom surface of my mat has been on a just-vacuumed wool rug in my living room for about 5 minutes and has now picked up every fiber, random dog hair, lint, etc. A little gross, but maybe I just need to vacuum more. Though the pressure points are comfortable, the thickness of the mat was one of the reasons I ordered it, hoping it to be an improvement over my other yoga mats. I still feel the same strain on my hands as I do with other mats. Anyway, I don't know much about acupressure--I'm hoping the size of of the pressure points don't matter. And, I figure if I can put my mat on a really thick carpet, it will help. Overall, I wasn't disappointed in the extra shipping costs, the delay in getting the mats, or even the mistake with the travel bag not coming with my order. But I was really disappointed in the huge disparity between the product in the video and the one I received.
Just hoping I receive a response shortly as to my questions regarding color, travel bag and overall mat quality that I also stated in the comment section of the last update.

campaign.story:
FogBox is an innovative planter that grows your plants using fog! It uses a new method of irrigation called aeroponics that waters your herbs through fertilizer-infused mist.
Aeroponics saves water and grows your plants much faster than conventional methods. It’s the most sustainable and efficient way to grow herbs and plants in your home.
Not all of us have the time, energy, or space to grow and maintain an in-soil garden, but with FogBox anyone can have an effortless and efficient aeroponic garden right in their homes.
How to get it
Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering a Fog Box. You'll get a special backer discount, and you'll receive your stuff before it is available in stores. Want to buy more than one? Check out All Rewards. Still confused? Check out How to Back this Project.
            FogBox is easy to use, extremely affordable, and can sustain up to 5 herbs at once. Give your plants the moisture that they need without over-watering them.
Growing your own herbs can save you hundreds of dollars per year and growing them with aeroponics can help you save even more.
No matter the season, you can grow all your favorite plants indoors and add healthy air to your living space with the FogBox. This is the future of agriculture, home-grown foods, gardening, and much more.
    FogBox uses only 12 watts of energy - about the same as a small lightbulb. The nutrients dissolve in the water, the water turns to mist in the fogger, then the roots can immediately absorb the nutrients right out of the air. This helps your plants grow twice as fast!
The roots hang in the air, so they can breathe as much carbon dioxide and oxygen as needed. This reduces mold and fungus and prevents “root-rot,” a common problem that happens when the roots can’t breathe.
Less Water Used and Wasted
Energy Efficient
Reduces Molds/Fungus
Accelerated Growth
Prevents Root-Rot
Soilless System
Grow Your Plants Anywhere
We designed a hand made, flame-polished acrylic LED light so you can grow your garden in your bedroom, office, bathroom, or sex dungeon.
  FogBox is the FIRST aeroponics system specifically created for the beginner gardener. It's simple to set-up and use, at an affordable price.
Take the first step towards leading a greener, more sustainable lifestyle and switch to organic foods without hurting your wallet. Have fun gardening with your kids while educating them on sustainable practices. Have access to super fresh herbs just an arm’s reach away and know exactly where your food comes from.
       1. Light : Turn On / Turn Off                                       
2. Water Capacity: 1 Liter
Wattage: 12 watts max
AC Adapter: Output - 24 volts ; Input - 120 to 240 volts (Wide range intl. voltage)
The FogBox has two functional settings: half power and full power. While on full power, the FogBox will need to be filled approximately 2-3 times a week while half power runs around 1-2. However, you should check on your FogBox daily to be safe.
        Our mission is to empower people to make the first step towards making healthier food choices and leading a sustainable and healthy lifestyle. FogBox makes it easier for people to grow their own food, even if they don’t have the time and energy to invest in a garden, even during winter time, and even in small apartments.
In recent years, we’ve seen amazing new products bring aquaponics and hydroponics to the forefront. These advancements in gardening and living decor have shaped the way we grow our plants, made our living spaces healthier, and are the first steps in creating a more livable, sustainable world. Now, we’re taking it to the next level with aeroponics.
The FogBox is complete. We’ve partnered with an experienced manufacturer. We need your help to bring this into every home and make this dream a reality.
Join us and bring awareness to aeroponics, The future of agriculture isn’t in the ground. It’s in the air.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We've spent most of the last 2 years working with our partners to mitigate as many risks as possible, yet we know there will still be hurdles along the way. We will always be transparent with our community about challenges.

Ship Date: We've set extremely achievable dates with buffer but there still are many things out of our control like US/Intl. customs, port strikes, quality control and other unforeseen issues. Either way, our guarantee is you will receive an extremely high quality product and we will be in constant communication through updates.

Product Changes: As we refine the FogBox based on additional community feedback and more product testing, changes may be made to improve the product. We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience.

Supplier Coordination: We work with a variety of suppliers to source the best materials and ensure that the product is developed correctly. Each supplier has its own challenges, which may affect its partners, including us.

Maintenance: As hard as we've worked to make this AS LOW MAINTENANCE AS POSSIBLE, it is still a living plant. As with all plants, there are many variables that can affect plant growth. We've done everything we can to make it as easy as possible.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.title: Be part of the revolution!

By donating just one dollar we will send you the PDF “Aeroponics Guide” that will teach you everything you need to know to start your own aeroponics system that grows food!
We want everyone to have a chance to enhance their living space. If you cannot contribute to the campaign for any reason, no worries, just back us with JUST $1 and you can still be HUGE part of the sustainability movement, and help this incredible concept gain exposure to more people than ever before!
EVERY backer counts! When you pledge, it helps this campaign and movement get in front of a LOT more people. Please help make this a reality by pledging just $1 to receive the “Aeroponics Guide” PDF, and to join our COMMUNITY! Our community is always notified of our progress, and have access to EXCLUSIVE sales!

updates.update_content:
Growing food indoors can be tough.
There’s often not enough sunlight, and soil can be messy.
By utilizing a soil-less method of growing agriculture, hydroponics helps solve that problem, and takes it one step further.
You can grow plants not only soil-lessly, but can also save on space, water, and obtain a higher yield of crop.

Urban farming also known as urban agriculture refers to producing food by growing them in the city. It is known to have its share of benefits some of which are easy and affordable access to organic produce all year round and the efficient use of limited space.
Most organic food is expensive making it difficult for a typical wage earner to afford. In conventional farming techniques, organic crops are harder to produce hence its costly price. The reason why most traditional farmers are forced to use chemical pesticides is to lessen the harmful factors present in the environment in accordance with different weather conditions. With urban farming, those factors are mitigated because it is done in a more controlled environment thus promoting a good yield of crops. Some urban farms are set up indoors, using water systems and artificial lighting techniques.

updates.update_userinfo: Restaurant that Prepares and Grows your Meal
updates.update_content: Aeroponics is fast becoming the most popular method of growing food. And by allowing people to grow healthier plants faster in less space and with less water, it's not hard to see why. We're already seeing the practice being adopted on the large scale with the Aerofarm supplying New York and New Jersey with fresh, nutritious and cheap vegetables, so it should come as no surprise that we are beginning to see the practice in our own neighborhoods, and maybe even in our favorite restaurants.

updates.update_userinfo: The Top 6 Reasons Why You Should Grow Hydroponically
updates.update_content:
Do you want to grow higher quality plants faster, more sustainably, and save on space?
Well, you're in luck!
Hydroponics is a method of growing agriculture that helps you grow efficiently and sustainably.

updates.update_userinfo: 3 Ways You Can Grow Plants To Improve Your Wellbeing!
updates.update_content:
Hey FogBox Backers,
With every second that passes by, the world is becoming more developed, and green spaces are quickly disappearing.
Why is this a problem?
According to multiple studies, green spaces appear to be essential to positive health and happiness. Many people are realizing the benefits of exercise, and a healthy diet. Similarly, having green in our lives appears to be of similar importance.

updates.update_userinfo: The Secret Technique To An (Almost) Unending Supply Of Herbs
updates.update_content:
Fresh food nowadays is at a premium…
Much of the produce you purchase from the grocery store can be WEEKS old, which is why it’s more important than ever to grow fresh food from your own home if you can. 
You’ll get to eat it before any nutrients are lost due to transportation causing decay, and they just seem to taste better fresher, wouldn’t you agree?

updates.update_userinfo: Why You Should Love Barley (Yes, You Should!)
updates.update_content:
Heyya Fogbox Backers!
Ever wondered what it's like having an all-in-one antioxidant drink? You’ve probably heard of different body-cleansing drinks that have stormed through different dieting pages. 
One such drink is known as barley water.

updates.update_userinfo: Christmas Flowers: What You Need To Know
updates.update_content:
Heyya, Fogbox backers!
It’s the most festive season of the year, and who’s not loving the Christmas spirit?
If you're lovin' all the positivity floating through the air, and the smell of mint-flavored toffee drinks - you may also love the sight of Poinsettias.

Our herb of the month - can anyone guess what it is?
It’s loved by many including the character Remy from Ratatouille.
If you didn’t already guess, it’s also an alliteration! Remy, Ratatouille, and well, the wonder herb Rosemary.

updates.update_userinfo: Biophilic Workspaces? What Are They And Why Should We Create Them?
updates.update_content:
Hey Fogbox Backers!
Do you know what it's like to work in a "lean" office space?
Do you often feel like you are losing focus, but gaining fatigue? You might want to try adding some plants here and there.
A workspace devoid of any open window or plants can be hard to handle.

campaign.story:
Love fresh herbs, but don’t have the space (or the time) to garden? Grow.Bar is bringing your backyard vegetable patch to your kitchen countertop! With Grow.Bar, you can grow a variety of herbs & microgreens such as basil, cilantro, broccoli, cabbage, kale, as well as different organic lettuces- making it easier than ever to add fresh produce to every meal.
Our Grow.Bar is a stylish & functional addition to your Kitchen!
  Our planned app lets you control your Grow.Bar & receive alerts.
    How to use your Grow.bar
    Red Beet Greens
        Grow.Bar is made from solid wood, a renewable resource. We are planning to offer these options: Beech, Maple, Bamboo & Birch- letting you express your style while harnessing your green thumb.
  For Grow.Bar’s electronics, we’ve teamed up with TinyCircuits, an electronics company based in Akron, Ohio. TinyCircuits designs and manufactures electronic products in their own production facility in Akron, and they have previously ran and fulfilled three Kickstarter campaigns of their own. They also have thousands of customers in over sixty countries!
Grow.Bar was created based on Founder Chef Torsten Schulz’s experience as a chef, farmer and consumer. Chef Torsten Schulz created Grow.Bar to help place the power of fresh herbs & microgreens in the hands of the home gardener and cook.
Chef Torsten Schulz is a European-trained chef with a Michelin star rating for his work at Restaurant Sao Gabriel in Portugal. Schulz has cooked in kitchens around the world, including Southern California’s Beverly Wilshire, CP Steak in Las Vegas, Lespinasse in Washington, D.C., Armani/Nobu in Milan, Italy and the Swissotel in Dalian, China. Chef Torsten has also been involved in commercial horticulture since 2002 and has gained extensive knowledge on using, growing, and distributing. He realized that people who cooked at home wanted access to restaurant quality ingredients without the demands of a garden or the expense at the specialty store. As a result, he developed Grow.Bar for everyone interested in eating a healthy balanced diet.
Chef Torsten Schulz
Chef Adam Kenworthy is a Chef, culinary consultant and health coach based in New York City. Chef Adam emphasizes nutritious foods, light cooking and a healthy lifestyle. He works with clients to understand their nutritional needs and creates custom menus with organically grown foods and the freshest local market ingredients. He started adding microgreens to all of his dishes because he understood the nutritional impact in using even the smallest amount. You will be able to enjoy Chef Adam's creations and his inspiring approach to creating healthy foods through our Grow.Bar community.
Chef Adam Kenworthy | Photo: Courtesy Kim Julie Hansen
Carole Radziwill is a writer and TV personality. She is a self-proclaimed “junk food-eating gal.” Her idea of the perfect food was a slice of cheese pizza at Joe’s on Carmine Street. She turned her kitchen into an office and routinely used her oven to store books. Then, nearly two years ago, she met Adam, a plant-based chef. Although she still enjoys chips and carbs, she has slowly started to change her life-long eating habits. She is now the proud owner of a Grow.Bar and enjoys the wonderful dishes Adam creates with it.
Carole Radziwill
You don’t have to be a chef to use microgreens. With the help of Grow.Bar, every home cook can make restaurant quality dishes at home. Grow.Bar was developed by Chef Torsten Schulz with an everyday user in mind. You don’t have to be a Top Chef to use the Grow.Bar, but your meals will certainly seem like you are! This system is great for parents, kids and teachers alike who like the idea of getting back in touch with food. We are chefs and will help our Grow.Bar community along the way.
  Our Marketing Agency
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We have a working model that we have tested and grown with for over 8 months. We like the current version, but have identified methods to decrease weight, costs and time to manufacture. With a successful campaign, we will implement the changes and make our current system even more awesome, more appealing and easier to use.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

support.descp: Any support is great support in our eyes! You’ll be the first to receive the latest campaign updates, news, stretch goals and more.

support.title: Grow.Bar Recipe Kit
support.descp: Love Grow.Bar but not sure what to cook? Receive 20 of our Grow.Bar digital recipes & learn how to make restaurant-quality dishes with herbs and microgreens you’ve grown yourself! Not to mention, we’ll follow you on Instagram and give you a shoutout

support.title: Meet the Chef's
support.descp: Receive a half hour, 1-on-1 phone or Skype chat with Michelin Star Chef Torsten Schulz & Chef Adam Kenworthy for an introduction of The Grow.Bar system, its uses, as well as some Q&A. Plus you’ll get a basic seed kit, digital recipe book and Instagram shoutout.

support.title: Early Bird Grow.Bar
support.descp: For just $200, you can get your very own Grow.Bar system, one organic seed kit, a digital recipe book and a signed thank you note. We’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign to make sure you get your Grow.Bar in the wood species of your choice.

support.descp: Don’t miss your last chance to get Grow.Bar at a discounted price! We’re offering a Kickstarter special of one Grow.Bar system and one organic seed kit for 25% off of the future retail price. We’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign to make sure you get the wood species of your choice.

support.title: Grow.Bar WORLDWIDE
support.descp: We would like to extend an invitation to all of our international friends as well. This reward includes a Grow.Bar system shipped right to your door! At this time, we are not able to ship our super convenient seed kits worldwide, but we working on it. You may purchase your own soil & seeds to start growing your microgreens with Grow.Bar!

support.title: Grow.Bar for Kids
support.descp: Help your children learn about gardening and growing their own food with Grow.Bar. Engage your children and satisfy their hungry minds. Receive a Grow.Bar system and four organic seed kits, a ph meter and a fun manual, plus 10 healthy recipes children actually want to eat.

support.title: Special Edition Grow.Bar
support.descp: We’re offering Kickstarter backers an exclusive chance to receive Grow.Bar in our special edition Cherry and Walnut versions! This also includes one organic seed kit. We’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign to make sure you get the wood species of your choice.

support.title: Grow.Bar Subscription for The Home Cook
support.descp: Best for the avid home cook! Receive a Grow.Bar system, a 1-year seed kit subscription (2 seed kits per month), a digital recipe book and a signed thank you note. We’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign to make sure you get your Grow.Bar in the wood species of your choice.

support.title: Buy One, Gift One
support.descp: Receive a Grow.Bar system plus one organic seed kit for yourself and we will send another Grow.Bar system and organic seed kit as a gift to someone you love. We’ll also send you a digital recipe book and a personalized thank you note. We’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign to make sure you get your Grow.Bars in the wood species of your choice.

support.title: 3 Day NYC Trip for 2
support.descp: Meet the team behind Grow.Bar (Chef Torsten, Chef Adam & Carole Radziwill) up close and personal! On this trip, you will learn about the Grow.Bar and get a private training session as well as a personal dinner party for you and your guest right in your very own fabulous SOHO loft. You’ll also receive two exclusive Grow.Bar systems and a 1-year seed kit subscription (2 per month) shipped to your home.

support.title: Super Early Bird Grow.Bar
support.descp: Receive a Grow.Bar system and one organic seed kit for 40% off the future retail price. We’ll send out a survey at the end of the campaign to make sure you get your Grow.Bar in the wood species of your choice.

Thank you, backers!
A big thanks to each and every one of you for taking the plunge and being some of the first Grow.Bar supporters- we’re excited to bring farm-to-table cooking right into your kitchen.
To make sure you receive your Grow.Bar and are growing your own microgreens as soon as possible, we need your help in sharing our campaign with your family and friends!
