campaign.story:
Calla is a fresh herbs indoor garden that keeps your favorite store-bought potted herbs healthy at hand all year round. Calla is awesome and smart. It takes care of your plants with an appropriate lighting and a controlled watering with specific organic nutrients. Calla is the very first product of the company 4Senses.
                         For any further inquiry, feel free to contact info@4senses.be.
Your herbs die too soon?
Fight against food waste! Food has a one in three chance of finishing in the trash. It is probably the case of your basil. Even if you try to water it, to give it some light, it is not easy to keep it up alive and a lot of cuisine lovers are concerned by this issue.
  Calla brings the solution to cuisine lovers
With Calla, you will never miss fresh herbs again. Calla keeps your herbs fresh and healthy for months and you can harvest several times without worries… they will keep on growing again and again. From now on, enjoy your herbs more than once.
  Calla is for all the home chefs
Rediscover the pleasure of fresh and creative cooking. Get close to Calla, have a look, smell the plants, touch them and let your inspiration define your wishes to prepare a tasty meal!
From salty to sweet, Calla is your closest friend to flavor your meals. Add a touch of fresh mint to your desert or a sprig fresh thyme in your tea. You are the Home Chef. Let your imagination run free.
Calla has already inspired Julien Lapraille, an incredible Belgian chef but also a huge fan of healthy fresh herbs. He has given us a special recipe for this Kickstarter campaign. To thank our bakers, we will share with them his creative recipe prepared with fresh herbs from Calla.
  Calla keeps your plants healthy
Plants need three essential elements to grow all year round: water, light and nutrients. Calla makes sure to bring the exact quantity of these three elements in your home for a perfect care of your plants. You can stop worrying about keeping up your plants, Calla is here for you and does everything to ensure a long and beautiful life of your herbs.
What herbs in Calla?
Calla welcomes any kind of store-bought potted herbs that fits Calla's size. Enjoy fresh herbs ready to be harvested.
Calla is designed to keep herbs healthy and provides all the elements every plant needs to feel healthy and to grow. Therefore, feel free to grow your own seeds or to introduce your favorite small house plants and flowering plants in Calla. Tell us about your ideas and achievements; we will share on our social networks. We are also going to do new tests to offer you more possibilities with Calla.
A modular design
There is a Calla for everyone and you are the sole decision maker of your interior design! Customize and change the size of your indoor garden that can welcome two to six potted fresh herbs: 6 pots on your central island, four against a wall, three in a corner or two on your window sill. Change also the design of your Calla by introducing flowering plants or indoor plants. Don’t be scared to test new things.
With Calla, create your indoor garden according to your space and desires. Calla gives life and flavor to all types of herbs and is designed to fit any room in your home. With its compact size and modular design, Calla waters up to six fresh herbs ready to be collected while offering an aesthetic light touch.
Easy to use
Fill the water tank, buy your herbs and add nutrients, put them in Calla, plug in and… enjoy cooking! Calla is smart, it waters your plants at the right time and its light turns off every evening at the same time. It is all automated. Simply add water when the light flashes; it means that the tank is empty. You can also easily carry your herbs to your worktop thanks to the portable pots.
Calla mimics nature
Calla combines technic and esthetic to take care of your herbs. Calla is equipped with a horticultural LED technology that offers a light adapted to the cycle of the plants and that mimics the sunrise and the sunset, according to your sleep time. You'll be pleased to wake up and to relax the evening with a nice cosy warm light.
Positive health effects
Did you know that eating fresh herbs is good for your health?! Each herb has its own secret. As an example, drink a tea with fresh mint at the evening improves your digestion.
  Calla has been designed by Jean-François Parisse from Ideasign, a belgian designer well-known for bringing more greenery at home. Calla, as its name says, has been designed according to the flower Calla; the source of inspiration of Jean-François.
  In order to bring you the perfect achieved product, we worked with a research center in horticulture called Carah Condorcet. A dozen of prototypes have been tested for months to optimize every parameter from the lamp to the nutrients for anyone potted herbs in every indoor condition.
  Julien Lapraille is a colourful Home Chef and a TV/radio host in Belgium. Big fans of local products and the universe of fresh herbs, Julien and 4Senses offer as part of their partnership, original and exclusive rewards such as :
the Julien Lapraille autographed cookbook. Send us your custom text at info@4senses.be;
the prestige box containing 4 craft plates;
a cooking classe with Julien as master of ceremonies. Enjoy the time of an evening in a creative atmosphere around the world of fresh local products. Time and location to be set (in Belgium).
        First of all, THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT and discover our rewards below! Every help and every pledge counts.
Choose your favorite reward and feel free to ask us about anything and contact us at info@4senses.be!
For your information, for the desired reward, you can buy it at a higher price than stated to support us even more.
  Two young entrepreneurs are behind 4Senses. On the left is Flo, the gourmand who has always dreamed of undertaking projects. On the right, this is Rom, a cooking lover looking for the best flavors and who has always had the ambition to create a project around the culinary world. We met on the benches of an engineering school and that’s when we decided to tackle together the issue of keeping our herbs healthy. To carry out the project, Flo undertook a Master in Entrepreneurship.
So it is with our technical and business skills, combined with our love of good food that we decided to embark on the adventure and to develop our first product Calla. For the good development of the project, we also work in parallel with various key partners. Thank you to them for their support.
  With a growing population and decreasing arable land area, we aim to provide creative and sustainable solutions to install green, sustainable and cultivable spaces in our cities. Our global vision is about world of food and especially the urban agriculture.
    Dimensions: 13” x 13” x 16.5” for a complete Calla
Weight: 5.5 lbs
Power: 12 W for the LED Light and 3 W for the pump
Finish: PS plastic with UV protection and soft touch
In the box:
(1) Central structure composed of
- Controlled LED light
- Self-watering system (pump included)
- Water supplier
- LED light cover
(2) From 2 up to 6 lower pots according to your order
(3) From 2 up to 6 upper pots according to your order
(4) Nutrients pack
(5) Filters pack
(6) Power supply
(7) User Manual
Timeline
Here follows the timeline of our project. This timeline is of course theoretical but, based on competent advice and background knowledge, we aim to deliver you Calla in February 2017, right in time to prepare for spring !
In order to give you the perfect product, we need to invest in special molds allowing us to replicate plastic pieces at a high rate. So before to manufacture, we have to invest. Funds from this crowdfunding campaign will be mainly used to finance a first stock and the resulting profit will be allocated to the molds financing. To pay them, other funding parts are necessary and the success of this crowdfunding campaign is of high importance as it will enhance the funding leverage effect among investors. Funds from the campaign will be allocated as shown on the graph below. 
The other funding part will come from private and public investors. It may reassure you to know that if we fail to finance the molds, you will get your money back.
Help us to reach 75.000€ and to offer a free one-year of nutrient sticks for all of our backers!
   You want to keep informed or simply discover Calla on the social networks? Or maybe you want to be freshly inspired by Calla's pictures or some inspiring recipes? The following links are made just for you then :)
Facebook
Twitter
Instagram
Pinterest
Website
         Calla est le tout premier produit de la société 4Senses. Calla est un jardin d’intérieur qui prend soin de vos pots d’aromates frais achetés en magasin et ce, toute l’année et à portée de main. Calla est design et intelligent. Il garde en bonne santé vos plantes grâce à un éclairage adapté et un arrosage contrôlé en eau et nutriments.
                                                 Pour toute autre information, contactez-nous via info@4senses.be.
  Difficile d’entretenir vos herbes aromatiques?
Luttez contre le gaspillage alimentaire! Un tiers de notre nourriture finit à la poubelle et c’est probablement le cas de votre basilic. Vous avez certainement essayé de l’arroser, de lui donner de la lumière… en vain ! Bref, ce n’est pas facile de garder son basilic en vie et vous n’êtes pas le seul mais rassurez- vous, avec Calla, vous n’aurez plus à vous soucier de vos herbes aromatiques.
  Calla est là!
Calla garde vos herbes aromatiques fraiches en bonne santé jusqu’à plusieurs mois. Consommez-les sans fin… Elles repousseront encore et encore. Grâce à Calla, profitez de vos aromates plus d’une fois.
  Calla, le compagnon des cuisiniers en herbe
Redécouvrez le plaisir d’une cuisine fraiche et créative. Soyez proche de votre Calla, jetez un regard sur vos herbes, sentez-les, touchez-les et laissez l’inspiration venir à vous pour préparer un délicieux petit plat.
Du salé au sucré, Calla est votre compagnon pour apporter de la saveur à vos préparations. Ajoutez une touche de menthe fraiche à votre dessert ou une brindille de thym frais dans votre thé. C’est vous le cuisinier en herbe. Laissez libre cours à votre créativité.
Calla a déjà inspiré Julien Lapraille, un cuisinier à domicile fan de produits du terroir et d’herbes aromatiques fraiches, et il a conçu une recette spécialement pour Kickstarter. Pour remercier nos contributeurs, nous partagerons cette succulente recette préparée avec des herbes fraiches de Calla.
  Calla garde vos plantes en bonne santé
Les plantes ont besoin de 3 éléments essentiels pour leur bon développement : de l’eau, de la lumière et des nutriments. Calla leur apporte la bonne quantité de ces 3 éléments pour un entretien parfait et tout ça… chez vous. Vos herbes aromatiques sont ainsi toujours à portée de main sans plus vous tracasser de leur entretien. Calla est là pour assurer une belle et longue vie à vos aromates.
Quelles herbes pour Calla?
Calla peut accueillir toutes sortes de pots d’aromates achetés en magasin qui correspondent à ses dimensions. Profitez d’herbes aromatiques prêtes à être récoltées.
Calla a été conçu pour entretenir les aromates mais il fournit tous les éléments dont les plantes ont besoin pour être en bonne santé et grandir. Par conséquent, n’hésitez pas à faire pousser vos propres graines ou à utiliser Calla avec des petites plantes d’intérieur ou des fleurs. Faites-nous part de vos idées et réalisations ; nous les partagerons sur nos réseaux sociaux. De notre côté, nous allons également tester Calla avec d’autres plantes afin de vous offrir encore plus de possibilités.
Un design modulable
Il y a un Calla pour chacun et vous êtes le seul à décider de votre décoration d’intérieur. Personnalisez et faites évoluer la taille de votre jardin d’intérieur. Agencez entre deux et six pots autour de lampe centrale : 2 pots sur votre appui de fenêtre, 3 dans un coin, 4 contre un mur ou 6 sur votre ilot central. Changez aussi le design de votre Calla en introduisant des fleurs ou des plantes d’intérieur. N’ayez pas peur d’essayer de nouvelles choses.
Avec Calla, vous créez votre jardin d’intérieur en fonction de votre espace et de vos désirs. Calla s’adapte à votre intérieur en redonnant vie et saveur à tout type d’aromate. Avec sa taille compacte et son design modulable, Calla arrose jusqu’à 6 pots d’herbes aromatiques prêtes à être récoltées tout en offrant une touche lumineuse esthétique.
Facile d’utilisation
Remplissez le réservoir d’eau, achetez vos aromates en magasin et ajoutez des nutriments, mettez le tout dans Calla, branchez et … prenez plaisir à cuisiner ! Calla est intelligent, il arrose vos plantes au bon moment et la lampe se coupe tous les soirs à la même heure. Tout est automatisé. Ajoutez simplement de l’eau quand la lampe clignote ; cela indique que le réservoir est vide. Vous pouvez aussi facilement emporter vos aromates où bon vous semble grâce au concept des pots portatifs.
Calla imite la nature
Calla combine technique et esthétique pour prendre soin de vos herbes aromatiques. Calla est équipé d’une lampe LED horticole qui offre une lumière adaptée au bon développement des plantes et qui imite le lever et le coucher de soleil. Vous pourrez alors vous réveiller et vous relaxer le soir avec une lumière ambiante chaleureuse.
Des effets positifs pour la santé
Saviez-vous que consommer des herbes fraiches est bon pour la santé ? Chaque herbe a son propre secret. Par exemple, boire un thé avec de la menthe fraiche améliore votre digestion.
  Calla a été dessiné par Jean-François Parisse de la société Ideasign, un designer belge bien connu pour mélanger design et verdure. Calla, comme son nom l’indique, a été développé en accord avec la fleur Calla ; la source d’inspiration de Jean-François.
  Afin de vous apporter un produit parfaitement terminé, nous avons travaillé avec un centre de recherche en horticulture appelé Carah Condorcet. Une douzaine de prototypes ont été testés encore et encore dans différentes conditions d’intérieur pendant presque un an pour optimiser chaque paramètre de la lampe aux nutriments et ce, pour chaque type de pot d’aromate.
  Julien Lapraille est un cuisinier à domicile haut en couleur ainsi qu'un chroniqueur TV/radio décalé. Grands fans des produits du terroir ainsi que de l'univers inspirant des herbes aromatiques, Julien et 4Senses vous proposent, dans le cadre de leur partenariat, des récompenses inédites et exclusives telles que:
le livre de recettes de Julien Lapraille dédicacé. Envoyez-nous vos textes personnalisés à l'adresse info@4senses.be; 
le coffret prestige contenant 4 assiettes artisanales; 
des cours de cuisine avec Julien comme maitre de cérémonie. Profitez le temps d'une soirée d'une ambiance créative autour de l'univers des produits frais du terroir. Le lieu et la date, en région wallonne, restent à convenir.
      Avant toutes choses, merci pour votre soutien! Découvrez nos récompenses ci-dessous. Chaque aide compte.
Choisissez votre récompense préférée et n’hésitez pas à nous faire part d’une demande particulière. Contactez-nous via info@4senses.be!
Pour information, vous pouvez acquérir la récompense choisie à un prix plus élevé que celui indiqué si vous souhaitez nous soutenir encore plus.
  Deux porteurs de projet se cachent derrière 4Senses. A gauche, c’est Flo, le gourmand qui a toujours rêvé d’entreprendre. A droite, c’est Rom, le passionné de cuisine à la recherche des meilleures saveurs qui a toujours eu pour ambition de créer un projet autour de l’univers culinaire. Nous nous sommes rencontrés sur les bancs d’une école d’ingénieurs et c’est là que nous avons décidé de nous attaquer ensemble à la problématique de l’entretien des herbes aromatiques. Afin de mener le projet à bien, Flo entreprend ensuite un master en entrepreneuriat.
C’est donc avec nos compétences techniques et entrepreneuriales, combinées à notre amour pour la bonne cuisine, que nous avons décidé de nous lancer dans l’aventure 4Senses et son premier produit Calla. Pour le bon développement du projet, nous travaillons également en parallèle avec différents partenaires clés. Merci à eux pour leur soutien.
  Notre vision globale tourne autour du monde de la nourriture, et plus spécialement de l’agriculture urbaine. Avec une population grandissante et des terres cultivables qui diminuent, nous avons pour ambition de proposer des solutions créatives et durables pour installer petit à petit des espaces verts et cultivables dans nos villes.
    Dimensions: 33 cm x 33 cm x 42 cm pour un Calla complet
Poids: 2.5 kg
Puissance: 12 W pour la lampe LED et 3 W pour la pompe
Matière: Plastique PS haute qualité avec protection UV et "soft touch"
Dans la boîte:
(1) Structure centrale composée de :
- Lampe LED contrôlée
- Système d'arrosage automatique (pompe inclue)
- Pièce de distribution d'eau
- Cache-LED
(2) De 2 à 6 pots inférieurs selon votre commande
(3) De 2 à 6 pots supérieurs selon votre commande
(4) Pack de nutriments 
(5) Filtres
(6) Alimentation électrique
(7) Mode d'emploi et informations
Calendrier des étapes
Voici le calendrier de notre projet Calla. Ce dernier est bien sûr théorique mais, sur base de notre expérience ainsi que des devis et des conseils compétents reçus, nous espérons livrer Calla chez vous en février 2017, juste à temps pour se préparer pour le printemps!
La production nécessite un investissement conséquent dans des moules permettant de répliquer les pièces plastiques servant à assembler le produit final. Avant de pouvoir produire, nous devons donc investir. Les fonds obtenus grâce à cette campagne serviront essentiellement à financer du stock et la marge dégagée sera allouée au financement des moules. Afin de pouvoir acquérir ceux-ci, d’autres sources de financement sont nécessaires et la réussite de cette campagne de pré-commandes est d’une grande importance car elle permettra d’améliorer l’effet de levier chez nos investisseurs. Les fonds récoltés grâce à la campagne seront donc distribués comme le montre le graphique suivant. 
L'autre partie du financement proviendra principalement d’investisseurs privés et publics mais rassurez-vous, si nous ne parvenons pas à financer les moules, votre argent vous sera restitué.
Merci beaucoup! Nous avons atteint la barre des 50.000€ mais ne nous arrêtons pas là. Aidez-nous à atteindre 75.000€ et débloquons ensemble un an de nutriments gratuits pour tous nos contributeurs!
  Vous souhaitez rester informé ou bien simplement découvrir Calla sur les réseaux sociaux? Vous voulez être fraichement inspiré par de nouvelles recettes créatives ou par des images inédites de Calla et de notre équipe 4Senses? Alors les liens suivants sont faits pour vous :) 
Facebook
Twitter
Instagram
Pinterest
Website
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
English Version

Our product will be manufactured mainly in Europe and as many project based on the marketing of a product, there are always schedule risk associated with manufacturing and supply chain logistics. A failure or delivery delays are possible.

However, you can be sure that your financial contribution will only be used to manufacture your Calla and a lot of people are there to help us. We have a great team and we do everything we can to offer you the best. It’s promised.

Version Française

Notre produit sera essentiellement fabriqué en Europe et comme de nombreux projets basés sur la commercialisation d’un produit, il y a toujours un risque associé au passage à la grande production. La fabrication et la chaine logistique restent des étapes complexes à franchir. Un échec ou des retards de livraison sont possibles.

Cependant, soyez certains que votre contribution financière sera uniquement destinée à fabriquer votre Calla et que nous sommes bien entourés. Promis, nous mettons tout en œuvre pour vous offrir le meilleur.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
simpli press makes your coffee press ritual easy from brewing to cleanup, while giving you a richer, smoother, and more complexed brew.
We also hope that you step into the specialty world of coffee a bit, if you haven’t yet. 
                            Brewing with simpli press is easy and brings out more flavor profiles by allowing you to use fine to medium grounds, which also brews in half the time of a regular French press.   
Cleanup is even easier! See how simpli press is French press without the mess!
  For an extra clean brew, just add a paper filter.
    All the grounds lift up in the grounds container, along with the filter! You can then just take the grounds container to your compost bin, your plants, or your trash and easily chuck out the grounds! (Note: Disposing all the coffee grounds in the sink is a plumbing no-no so don’t do it!)
By not having to scrape and tamp out your glass carafe to get the grounds out, save not only time but hopefully money by less chances of breaking your carafe!
Woah, show me that cleanup again!
    Get more out of your coffee by being able to use fine to medium grounds. With our special filter, you get a richer, smoother taste!
      So what does choosing your grind size and an optional paper filter mean to you?
You can tailor your brew to fit your roast and preference *or* just keep it simple by using any available grounds that you have! ¯\_(ツ)_/¯  
  When using fine-medium grinds, you not only get more LOVE and FLAVOR from your coffee but you also get a FASTER BREWING TIME because of the higher extraction rate! 
    We’ve brewed thousands of cups for coffee lovers, roasters, baristas, and coffee events across the country (NY Coffee Festival, Portland Coffee Fest, Coffee Con LA, SCAA Atlanta, etc), and here’s what they had to say about simpli press:
PLAY

We even won a New Product Award at Portland, coffee capital in America and judged by top coffee industry experts (note: Seattle was full in attendance at this event too)!
    Finally, a coffee press that consumers and coffee professionals both love and can use easily!
         simpli press is perfect for sharing or just have it all to yourself - you deserve it!
    simpli press is eco-friendly, leaving only compostable grinds after your morning brew.
  We’re redefining the way people press coffee. We’ve come this far with an incredibly small team and a boot-strapped budget, and we are committed to making simpli press a success. We talked to various manufacturers and created our first prototype in February 2015. We got the second prototype September 2015, where we put it through arduous testing brewing thousands of cups at coffee events, asked other coffee lovers for feedback, and further improved the design. Then in March this year, we ordered our third simpli press prototype from our manufacturing partner and are almost ready for production.
Manufacturing Costs
This is the most capital intensive part of our next phase. We have finalized our design, chosen our manufacturer and created a budget breaking down the costs for producing the initial molds, purchasing supplies, meeting the minimum quantity order, and shipping to consumers. We need your support to get simpli press to the next step.
Creating the 21st Century, Third Wave French press
Our goal is to not only develop a product, but to make great coffee accessible to all in today’s time. To do this, we need your support from this initial campaign to not only fund our production, but also get the word out about what we’re developing around the world.
        Simpli Press Mission
To make your coffee ritual more beautiful and easy in every way possible.
We want to make your coffee ritual easy from brewing to cleanup, while giving you the most delicious coffee.
We also want to make it easy and fun for you to try out different ways to make your brew to bring out the best in the roasts and according to your taste. We, as a company, will also incorporate giving back to education and coffee farming communities into our long-term plans.
The Team
Jenni Morse & Scott Morse (Co-Founders)
“This journey started over two years ago as a literal dream January 2014. I woke up and started sketching simpli press. With my dad being an inventor, it's just in my genes. The passion project became an obsession. By May 2015, I quit my job as an Executive Recruiter (Manufacturing & Engineering specialties) to focus on developing simpli press full-time. In the last year, Scott and I have been traveling the country showcasing the simpli press at coffee trade shows in New York, Portland, Los Angeles, and Atlanta. So far, the response has been more than encouraging to keep pursuing this crazy dream, this calling.” Jenni Morse
It all started with wanting to drink French press every morning, but between brewing and cleanup time, it just wasn't possible.
We also thought "There has to be a way to get all of those great coffee characteristics: the richness of an espresso, the flavor clarity and smoothness of a pour-over, and the body of a French press from one device and without a messy cleanup." With simpli press, one can develop an optimized brew in 2-3 minutes (by being able to use fine to medium grinds) plus an easier cleanup makes a difference in our hurried lives.
Then the taste factor came shortly after as our new favorite by being able to get more flavor out of the coffee beans with the fine to medium grinds (40% more according to the coffee scientist) and brew different roasts (light and medium). The smoothness of the brew is one that everyone always first notice.
We loved brewing at the live coffee events all over the country (see our Kickstarter video and more below) to just see people's reactions and feedback on the difference! We even won a New Product Award (3rd Place) at Portland amongst the established brands and judged by the industry experts (not to mention ultimate coffee snobs)! :)
More than two years, countless hours, personal sacrifice, and three prototypes later, we are introducing the simpli press: a coffee brewer that does just that!
Manufacturing Team
After six months of research and multiple referrals, we found the perfect manufacturer. Platform 88 has not only worked with major coffee/kitchenware brands, but has also worked with several successful Kickstarter campaigns in the coffee and beverage industry (which have delivered to backers and are a few are now for sale in retail stores).
We have met the owner in person and are in constant communication with the team. We plan to visit the factory and team in person, once the Kickstarter campaign commences.
Behind Our Team
  Special Thanks To
Thank you so much for checking out simpli press, French press without the mess and oh so much more. We can’t wait for you to make your coffee ritual more beautiful, in every way possible.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
After two years of developing and testing the simpli press prototype we are confident that we have the best design possible made with the best materials. We realize there is always the possibility of setbacks when bringing a product to market and have planned accordingly. We've teamed up with great engineers and manufacturers to ensure that production standards are kept to the highest quality:

DESIGN AND DEVELOPMENT
We have been working with Concepts Engineering for the past year and a half in the design and development of simpli press.

For the past ten months, we have traveled all throughout the US brewing thousands of cups for coffee lovers and professionals to gather their feedback before finalizing our design.

MANUFACTURING
We have been working with our manufacturer Platform 88’s engineering team for the past six months in getting the design ready for mass production. Our manufacturer is certified by the global leader in testing and quality certification, Bureau Veritas and has a proven record of creating coffee presses and other related products. We've also allotted enough of a cushion in our timeline so that any unforeseen setbacks will not delay the delivery date for our backers.

If, despite all of our planning, we are still delayed in our delivery, we will make communication with our backers a priority, and keep you informed of the progress every step of the way. 

We are committed to you, just as we are committed to simpli press. #teamsimplipress
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Don't waste your time or money. Be aware Simpli-press is NOT allowing negative reviews on their website. I purchased and received (after what two years?) my simpli-press, and it was a major disappointment. I didn't mind waiting - it's a kickstarter, and you know this happens sometimes. I also know that not all great design ideas actually work in practice, so I was again prepared for that. What I was NOT prepared for is dishonest business practices. I used the product, completed my review, which was honest and not in any way rude, and my review is NOT posted on the website. There are thousands who purchased the product, yet only 27 reviews (as of today) on the website (not kickstarter - the simpli press main website), all of them positive. I am a verified backer, and I tried very hard to like this product, but in the end it simply does not deliver on the main promise which is easier clean-up. Yes, it looks stylish. Yes, it makes a good cup of coffee. Cleanup is a nightmare. I tried both of the silicone rings and had the same problem with both. I followed the instructions carefully, watched the videos, and it's not the user it's the product. No matter what you do, the grounds escape into the bottom of the carafe, and it's impossible to get the grounds holder out of the press and separated from the plunger without making a huge mess.
I have the same experience, purchased the day the product became available for pre-order and has been disappointed at every phase of the process.

I have followed your video exactly. It has taken much more time and aggravation than using my regular french press. What was I thinking ordering 2 presses before I even knew the first one worked. If you can't help me make this release more easily, I want a refund for both.

Thank you for the presses! It definitely makes a tasty smooth coffee, although like most of the comments, the cleanup is not as nice as advertised. The second O-ring sent does work better. As observed by a few people, pressing until it hits the top of the basket, pouring, then lifting the plunger to allow the remaining brew to enter the basket and pressing down slowly works better to contain the grounds and get most of the remaining brew. Not as easy as I imagined, but not so bad that I will give up on it. Loving the fact that I have a good cup of coffee!
I hand my first brew and it was simply lovely :}

Another comment: After my first comment on here asking about people's experiences and complaining about mine, I was contacted by Simpli-press offering to call me and walk me through the process. While this is really nice of them, it seems a bit odd and should not be necessary if your product was designed to work correctly. It seems, especially of a product named Simpli-press, that if you have to walk your customers through its usage to get an adequate result there is a problem.
(*) that part of the instructions is stupid. carefully, slowly press the coffee all the way. you’ll be glad you did!

I agree with some of what you said, but I have yet to have a grounds-free cup of coffee yet. Even using the new ring with a coarse ground, I still had a bunch of grounds. I didn't even get to the bottom of the press yet either.

Ultimately, this coffee press product is not going to work because it doesn't actually physically press the grounds down. As long as there is liquid coffee and grounds floating in the bottom chamber, you will either have wasted liquid, or always have sediment in your coffee, and cleaning will always be a pain. Oh wait! That's like every other French Press! Cheers!

I received my Simpli Press today. It seemed like a nice idea and is made of good quality materials, but they probably should have gone with Compli Press as a name, because it’s complicated AF and will probably go into the back of the cabinet as a reserve. I’m gonna use it for a week though and see if I can adapt to using it efficiently. Unlikely, but I’m no quitter!
I haven’t received this item yet. Although based on the reviews below, it doesn’t seem promising. When will your shipping be completed please?

I received a defective unit!!! The metal basket does not have the grooves to accept the rubber filter ring. I'm sure you know what I'm describing. Makes the entire device basically useless. Also, the white letters on the glass are mostly rubbed off. I obviously received an early production unit. How do I get a refund or a new unit???

Conclusions: First, it does make a very good cup of coffee, no problems there. But, it just completely misses the mark otherwise. The magic of a French Press is how *simple* it is, where the Simpli Press is about as far from simple as you can get, while keeping the general mechanics. The pure hassle of using this press is likely to keep it on the shelf most of the time, while my regular french press and OXO pour over continue to do daily duty.

Unfortunately it does seem like it should be called the Overcompli(cated)-press. I backed this because of the claims of easier cleanup over a traditional french press, but like you I have found it to be even more of a hassle. Similarly I use a burr grinder and have found with a medium grind to have as much sediment as a french press on coarse. Next time I will probably just use coarse and see how that works, though the hassle and mess has certainly made it to where I don't really want to use it either.

So yeah, so far basically an over priced french press that doesn't make things easier, but actually more difficult and uses more coffee since you end up wasting quite a bit of the brew.

Regarding pricing: Even if creator stated to price at $39 - can't recall they have - customs will charge based on declared value including shipment costs. Also customs employees are well trained and highly skilled people and they have internet too ;) In my experience, in the end once funding money has been collected creators will declare the exact value once they're set to ship the items and there's nothing you can do about it. I don't blame the creators. I wish there were exceptions, instructions, agreements and legislation made for customs to handle items obtained by crowdfunding equally at cost price in order to stimulate start-up companies and backers globally. Now often there's a thin line between financial benefit backing a unique product from an other continent or buying an excellent product locally without that one great feature at the same price. This nice and well thought out FP just happens to be one of them.

campaign.story:
The world’s most comfortable, versatile, and durable pair of waterproof, leather gloves.
The 4-Season Glove is designed to endure all of life’s challenges and enable seamless transition between work, play, and everything in between.
Life is awesome, but we have a tendency to restrict ourselves and fall into monotony. Give’r provides a tangible reminder to ourselves and those around us to seize opportunities in the everyday and to give life our all. Give'r promotes a lifestyle fueled by passion, purpose, challenge and adventure.
We aim to inspire the unrelenting pursuit of dreams, the confidence to take the road less traveled, and the desire to share the wonders of life with others.
We promote these beliefs by designing and creating straightforward, fun, comfortable apparel and accessories, made for the Give’r that lives within us all.
 Choosing to Give’r doesn’t solely pertain to outdoor adventures, it’s about giving it your all in everything you do. If you’re trying a completely new hobby, starting a company, or even moving halfway across the world to discover new experiences, the 4-Season Gloves are here to put adventure back in your hands.
These gloves are designed and built to get the job done so you can Give’r however you choose! Whether you’re a man or woman, parent or child, student or teacher, professional or amateur, these gloves were designed for YOU!  Get out there and live it up!
Designed for your day-to-day adventures, the 4-Season Gloves are perfect for travelers, adventurers, athletes, and everyone in-between. They’re more than just great-looking comfortable gloves, they’re a daily reminder to seize opportunities in the everyday and live your life to the fullest.
The new 4-Season Gloves’ leather exterior provides superior dexterity, durability, and insulation for your hands. The gloves are waterproof and designed to handle colder temperatures and intense winter weather, while at the same time tough enough to literally hold a burning log. 
The 4-Season Gloves keep you warm and comfortable whether you’re gardening, skiing, chopping wood, climbing a mountain, or even dog-sledding. They make the cut for essential everyday gear that looks good, feels good and gets the job done.
Use the 4-Season Gloves for any cold-weather sport, work, or recreational activities. These gloves are as multifunctional as you are.
                                                                           Sizing (you will choose once the campaign is over):
If you have longer fingers and are on the line between sizes then go with the larger size of the two. If you are in between sizes on the chart, and like a tighter fit, then go with the smaller size; if you like a roomier relaxed fit, then go with the larger size.
Comparison to sizing on Classic Give’r Gloves: The 4-Season Gloves are designed to be more form fitting when compared to the Classic Give’r Gloves. While most customers wear the same size in both styles, if you are between sizes, or find your Classic Gloves to fit snugly, we recommend you select the larger size of options.
Initial Branding: 
  Each glove is as unique as their owner, and we take great pride in the workmanship and attention to detail needed to make a pair of glove truly YOURS. Limit of three letters if you choose to have your gloves branded, branded on both the left and right hand.
Wax “Bomb-Proof” Coating:
We will hand-treat and bake your gloves with bee’s wax, saturating the all-leather shell, resulting in a look that is as tough as the gloves themselves.
We set out to design a timeless and stylish pair of gloves that is utilitarian through and through. Any day, any situation...this one glove does it all.
  Durable Shell
The outermost layer features top grade cow leather that is tanned and treated to be waterproof. While cheaper alternatives exist, this leather was selected because it is the toughest available/on the market, yet soft and quick to break in. Leather shell has been reinforced for wear and tear on palms and fingertips.
 Hipora Membrane
The second layer of the 4-Season Glove features a membrane that is wind-proof and waterproof, protecting your hands and keeping them warm and dry. This membrane features tiny microscopic perforations that enables water vapor to escape, keeping your hands ready for action.
Thinsulate Insulation
The third and innermost layer utilizes material that is breathable and moisture-resistant to keep you warm and comfortable. Thinsulate insulation works by trapping heated air molecules between you and the outside thereby keeping your hands warm and isolated from the cold.
Leather Skirt
Leather skirt keeps snow, moisture and other material out of the gloves when putting them on and while wearing them. The inner cuff of skirt provides the perfect canvas for the Give’r Crew to hand brand your initials.
Leather Strap On Cuff
Pull straps make it easy and non-damaging to put on or remove your gloves as quickly as as you like.
Elastic Cuff
The compact design of the elastic cuff provides a snug fit, yet flexible fit around your wrist. Keeps heat in and and everything else out while remaining comfortable enough to wear all day.
Evolved from our best selling Classic Give’r Glove, coined “The Glove of 100 Uses”. The demanding terrain and temperature extremes encountered by the Give’r community resulted in countless requests for a glove that retained the core of the Classic, but incorporated additional features and enhanced performance.
Over the past year and a half, we have designed and tested more than two dozen glove prototypes in our pursuit of this glove.
Give’r was founded in March 2012 in Jackson Hole, Wyoming. Our product line began with two t-shirts, two hats and a commitment to our customers that we’d stop at nothing to ensure they were happy with their Give’r Gear. Our dream has come to life through 4 years of working multiple jobs, taking challenges head-on, continuously learning, receiving a tremendous amount of help, and our belief that the world is a better place with Give’r in it.
 The road for a lifestyle apparel start-up company in Wyoming is not paved or easy-going, but we have been living by our motto, and have given our all to shape this vision into reality. We are beyond psyched with this opportunity made possible by Kickstarter and you, our backers, to write the next chapter of the Give’r story. Without your help, we wouldn’t exist. We are eager to set our roots and charge forward as a company that exemplifies what can be possible when you follow your heart. We take this step with confidence in our products and wholehearted gratitude for all those in our corner, cheering us on. 
 We strongly believe in giving back through service and financial support, and have worked with dozens of local, regional, national and international non-profits since our inception. We believe in forming community by working with local businesses and connecting our customers from across the globe. We are proud members of 1% for the Planet and 1% for the Tetons, and are committed to playing an active role in making the world a better place for generations to come.
Our goal is to bring to life the Give’r that lives within us all. Straightforward, fun, comfortable apparel and accessories were at our core on day one, and we have built upon this foundation over the last 4 years. Your support enables our team to be fully dedicated to Give’r while maintaining control of our mission and the ability to take risks that may not be possible through traditional fundraising means. 
 While the 4-Season Gloves were merely an idea 2 years ago, the opportunity to share a final product in the flesh is something we are extremely proud of. We have completed the initial short-run of production and are as psyched as our videos and pictures show. They are freakin’ awesome. We are a young company, and putting the 4-Season Gloves into full production takes a lot of work and capital. We are 110% committed to the work in front of us, but need your help in bringing the 4-Season Gloves to life at large-scale production. Take advantage of the big time discounts from retail pricing and join in the effort to support a company who is giving it their all to bring you the best damn gloves ever.
It all began in 2011 with the design and creation of custom hats commemorating an epic annual kayaking expedition in Ontario, Canada. These hats, featuring the skyline of the Tetons and the colloquial phrase “give’r”, were the seed from which Give’r was born. This team, with help from an awesome and ever-growing community, gave life to a philosophy and lifestyle that is perfectly embodied by these 4-Season Gloves...our greatest creation to date!
PLAY
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We know there can always be curve balls along the way during production. Our initial short-run production and experience in manufacturing and eCommerce over the last 4 years has allowed us to mitigate much of the risk, but it still exists. We will always be honest and communicative with our community about challenges, including these:

Ship Date: We are confident we will ship by the projected dates, as we have manufacturers standing by for final order quantities. While there is always a chance things will take longer than planned, we feel strongly that our experience will mitigate this, and that all pieces are in place to Give'r.

Product Changes: As we receive community feedback and continue our product testing, slight changes may be made. Rest assured, we'll only make changes that enhance the product experience.

Just as we felt 4 years ago when Give'r was formed, we commit to you that we’ll do everything possible to ensure you’re happy with your gloves. If still skeptical...get a pulse from our community via our website (www.give-r.com ), social media outlets or press reviews.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Introducing the Frontier Mittens - The Best Damn MITTENS Ever
updates.update_content: Greetings 4-Season Glove Backers!  After hearing from many of you and other Give'r community members, we're most psyched to announce the launch of The Frontier Mittens, The Best Damn Mittens Ever.

updates.update_userinfo: Final Hours to Give'r - The Ol' Faithful Midweight Pullover
updates.update_content:
Greetings Give'r Backers,
We've been blown away by the support shown in bringing the Ol' Faithful to life in our 2nd Kickstarter Campaign! After reaching our goal on day 1, we kicked into gear with production and don't want you to miss out on the chance to get your very own Ol' Faithful at discounts starting at 30% off retail! We've partnered up with Kris Kringle himself to ensure rewards will get there by Christmas - so don't hold back!

updates.update_userinfo: Introducing the Give'r Ol' Faithful: Your Go-To Midweight Pullover
updates.update_content:
Hello Give'r Backers!
We hope this message finds you well and enjoying the awesomeness of summer (or winter for all of our southern hemisphere friends!).  We have been Given'r in a serious way here at HQ, releasing our New Tank Tops, Magnetized Fly Fishing Hats (Yes, you read that correctly...they are unreal!), and working on the next generation of gloves to ensure you're equipped to Give'r!

Greetings Give'r Backers!

Hello and Happy Spring to all from Jackson Hole, Wyoming!  Just a year ago, you all came together with a shared belief in our team and the power of choosing to Give'r.  This shaped a dream into reality as the 4-Season Give'r Gloves were brought to life through a campaign of epic proportions.  Your support and energy fueled our fire and we put everything we had into creating, customizing and delivering your Best Damn Gloves Ever, and what an adventure it was!  We have pushed ourselves, learned a ton and aimed to be the best damn team for each of you, feeding off your kind words and encouragement every step of the way.  The Give'r story has forever changed thanks to YOU!

We are psyched to keep charging forward and giving it our all, and can't wait to share the next chapter with you as it is written in the Give'r Garage.  For now, we just want to say and send you an electronic high five...hell, make it an up-top, straight-elbowed, aggressive, double electronic high five followed by an 80s hair band high-kick that might result in a pulled hammy...

campaign.story:
Let’s face it, when it comes to the future of energy, something has to give. Conventional resources are limited and the grid is overburdened and unreliable. Renewable energy sources like wind and solar are a critical part of the solution, but they’re also intermittent: limited to times when the sun is shining and the wind is blowing. And large amounts of intermittent energy simply can’t be accommodated our current energy grid.
Fortunately, there’s a fix. One that reduces your energy costs and contributes to a self-healing, ultra-efficient energy grid. This single, elegant solution is Orison.
Orison gives you power over energy like never before. Whether you get your energy from the grid, a solar array, or some other source, you can now control when to store it and when to use it. Orison will automatically store energy when utility rates are low, and then use that energy to power your home or business when rates are high. During a power outage, it will automatically power your home or business and make sure none of your stored energy is sent back to the grid. By localizing your energy distribution, you save money and reduce peak demand on the grid.
If you have a rooftop solar array, you’re producing zero energy at night, and not enough during peak hours in the morning and afternoon. And that excess energy you generate during the middle of the day and sell back to the grid? It’ll soon be sold at a loss (or in some cases not at all) when new changes to metering rates take effect. What you need is a way to store the solar energy you produce so you can use it whenever you need it. Orison gives you the power to do just that.
Orison is highly intelligent and fully networked. Each unit is linked via the Orison Cloud. This integrated network uses data including utility rates, peak demand charges, weather, blackout alerts, your usage profile, and more to determine the optimal operating schedule for your device. The Orison Cloud also works collectively to make the energy grid as a whole exponentially more efficient—capable of handling the growing influx of intermittent renewable energy, without the high cost of infrastructure entailed by other solutions.
 Watch Eric give a demo of our prototype
PLAY

                   When we say Orison is plug-and-play, we mean it. The future of sustainable energy depends on mass adoption. And the mass adoption of any technology begins with ease of use. That’s why we designed Orison to be as effortless to install and operate as possible. Simply plug it in like you would any other appliance, and you’re done. Orison automatically begins working. No permits, construction, or wiring required.
Orison’s mobile app gives you control over your system and access to its insights, wherever you are. In the event of a power outage, you’ll know exactly when it happens and when the grid is restored. And you can rest assured that Orison is powering your home in the interim. The app also lets you clearly see the money your system saves you on energy. You can easily program times for charging and discharging, and seamlessly add and manage multiple Orison devices for scaled power and savings.
Orison is expertly engineered to scale to your home or business’s growing energy needs. If and when your needs exceed the capacity of your Orison configuration, simply add one or more Orison Panel+ for a fraction of the cost. Increased storage comes at a decreased price.
     Other home energy storage systems sound like a marvel—until you realize just how much installation will cost you. At Orison, our goal is to make the next generation of energy available to everyone, not just those who can afford to vacation in space.
           The revolutionary power of Orison comes complete with a 10-year/5,000 lifecycle warranty. Orison’s performance is monitored in real time by the Orison Cloud. The moment a problem is detected with any system, the Orison team is notified. We alert you of the issue, immediately ship a replacement unit to your door, complete with a return package for the defective unit. Your power storage needs will barely miss a beat.
                   Who Can Use Orison?
Imagine a system that fits in with your space and lifestyle, saves you money today and helps build a secure energy world. Orison is a solution for any energy consumer, including homes with solar and businesses of all kinds and sizes.
Any Energy Consumer
Orison is the only plug-and-play energy storage system that allows every energy consumer, whether you own or rent a home, townhome, condo or apartment; have solar; or own a business, to be an active member of the energy revolution.
It’s only natural for you to want to minimize your energy bill. Orison allows you to reduce the effects of increased charges for electricity during peak demand.
When you use Orison, energy is always available to you. That means that anytime a blackout occurs and the electricity grid goes down you won't. Imagine not having to worry about whether you will maintain power in your home or business every time a storm comes through!
Every Orison owner also becomes a contributor to a clean, reliable energy future. Renewables are currently limited by the lack of available storage. The more people that use Orison, the more renewable energy that can be added to the grid. In addition, because energy storage can now be everywhere the grid then becomes more resilient and stable, which is the exact outcome that utilities and electricity producers are actively seeking.
Homes With Solar
A common theme for rooftop solar owners in many states and countries is the impending reduction of Net Metering Feed-In-Tariffs, the amount of money you receive when you sell the electricity you produce to the grid. The choice faced by rooftop solar owners is simple: either continue to sell the energy you produce at a considerable loss, or stop selling and use the energy you produce yourself.
Orison offers the ability to store rooftop solar energy locally, which is equivalent to buying and selling at the same price. Now you can access all the benefits of having solar along with those associated with Orison energy storage!
Businesses of All Kinds and Sizes
Whether you operate a shop, restaurant, hotel or an office, as a business owner you have to worry about many things. With Orison, electricity doesn't have to be one of them. Your bottom line can be improved by taking advantage of existing Time of Use rates and minimizing peak Demand Charges. You can also guarantee continuity of service to your customers during a blackout.
In addition to reducing costs and ensuring continuity, the Orison Panel is customizable. You can choose whether to apply your brand and look, or place them behind the fixtures and equipment you already have. Orison is your plug-and-play, smart energy business solution.
                   We believe a bright new future is possible. We’re innovative, visionary, and a little bit nuts. But when your goal is to spearhead a revolutionary movement in energy, a dash of crazy doesn’t hurt. We’re in this for the future of our planet. Because our vision is audacious, we count on one another to make it happen. We inspire each other to dream more, learn more, do more, and become more.
Helming the Orison ship are three leaders with proven successes in renewable energy, consumer electronics, advanced aerospace systems, commercial land development, and more. Their combined industry experience has given them critical insight into effective energy storage distribution and networking on a massive scale.
Orison was borne of a shared realization: a future powered by renewable energy is only possible through the mass adoption of stored energy systems to alleviate strain on the grid.
With this revolutionary understanding in tow, our founders leveraged their decades of expertise in examining energy efficient buildings, alternative energy sources, and the power of networked systems. Combining these technologies, they sought to create small yet fully integrated energy storage systems linked together by a massive network we call the “Orison Cloud.” The Orison Cloud is engineered both to save consumers money and stabilize the grid against the rapid increase of intermittent renewable energy.
After refining the technical concept, developing a primary business model, interviewing loads of potential customers, and creating a business plan to finance the growth of the company, we can finally announce that Orison is poised to lead an energy storage revolution.
We’re currently developing fully functional prototypes that will enter beta testing in Q1 FY16. With your support, we’ll initiate limited production and UL certification in Q2 FY16, followed by manufacturing for commercialization!
It’s time to rethink the power of energy. Thank you for being part of the revolution.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We believe we have most of the regulatory hurdles covered and have started working with third party compliance authorities. However, there is still a certain amount of risk to be overcome. Our technology works as described and has already overcome some difficult hurdles. We recognize that innovations frequently bump into regulatory hurdles that must be adjudicated, which is why we are participating in this rapidly changing regulatory space. We will acquire UL certification before shipping. It is important to all of our customers and the future success of Orison.

We know there can always be hurdles along the way during product development. Our experience has allowed us to mitigate much of the risk, but it still exists. We will always be transparent with our community about challenges, including these:

Ship Date: We are confident we will ship by the projected dates, as we have already begun the conversation with manufacturers. While there is always a chance that things will take longer than planned, we believe our experience will mitigate this.

Product Changes: As we refine Orison based on additional community feedback and more product testing, slight changes may be made. We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
I served as a Navy SEAL for over 10 years, taking part in deployments to both Iraq and Afghanistan. During our missions, we would camo up, travel to our hide site, and execute our orders. However, by the time we made it there, we’d already sweated off most of the paint. 
 What’s worse, I’d return with burnt and blistered skin from having been out in the sun all day. We never thought to apply sunscreen. We thought we were protected, but we weren't.

Predator Warpaint was born out of a glaring need to make a better product in an industry that has failed to innovate. Current camo products leaves you exposed to the sun. They do nothing to protect your skin from harmful UV rays. You get burned which can lead to skin cancer down the line. The problem was obvious, camo face paint should do more than just conceal.
The answer was simple. We leveraged the latest in sunscreen technology to provide a superior product that protects the user from the sun and doesn’t need to be reapplied during high perspiration activities.
We created Predator Warpaint.
Created by a Navy SEAL, Predator Warpaint is the most effective camo face paint, period. Once you put it on, it stays on and doesn’t come off until you take it off.
The high quality formula is water resistant, sweat resistant, non-migrating, and durable during high perspiration activities. Made with SPF 50, Predator Warpaint protects your skin from harmful UV rays and helps prevent burns and skin cancer.

We have two different colors packages.
Mil-Spec Camo For Military
Woodland Camo For Hunters and Survivalists
In effort to produce a military-grade camouflage face paint that also protected the skin beneath it, we worked with Navy SEALs in San Diego, California to produce a product that met their standards of performance. 
Predator Warpaint is formulated to perform in the environments where our modern warriors operate. Whether you’re in the military or  hunter. Predator Warpaint is for you. Military-grade face paint designed by Warriors for Warriors.
By Warriors, For Warriors isn’t just something we say; some of our nation’s most elite warriors will be preparing for battle using our product.
Our number one goal is to get Predator Warpaint into the hands of every active duty service member. Though we have made some significant progress exposing our new product to the military, we know that it is still going to take time to get it into every service member’s hands. We are providing the option for backers to purchase Predator Warpaint and we will donate it on their behalf to Active Duty military personnel. This option will not only reassure our Kickstarter backers that their money is directly benefiting our military, but it will also expedite the adoption of a new camo product that will keep members of our military healthier. The 'Predator Protects' packages enable everyone to get behind our brand to support those men and women serving this great nation.
Meet the Co-founder Nick Norris
Nick served in varied combat leadership roles in both Iraq and Afghanistan, fought alongside US Army Infantry and USMC Infantry, and ultimately concluded his Active Duty service as the Officer In Charge of SQT. Nick used camo face paint during his training and deployment but rarely thought about the need to apply sunscreen in conjunction with the camo. The result was often burnt and blistered skin that had been hidden under layers of traditional camo face paint which he falsely assumed would provide protection from the sun. He identified a problem, formulated a solution, and vetted the demand for a better product through his relationships in the SEAL Teams, which resulted in the creation of Predator Warpaint.
Created by a Navy SEAL, We, understand the need to protect and conceal and what it takes to perform at your best.
      Designed for an outdoors lifestyle, Predator Warpaint is completely odorless, helping you get closer to game without being detected. Be a more effective hunter by concealing yourself with the highest quality grade camo face paint.
                  We have built a product that clearly solves a problem, we see the opportunity to innovate in this space, and we intend to continue to improve our product to deliver a superior camo face paint option to our customers.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We know there can always be hurdles along the way during product development. Our experience has allowed us to mitigate much of the risk, but it still exists. We will always be transparent with our community about challenges, including these:

Ship Date: We are confident we will ship by the projected dates, as we have already begun the conversation with manufacturers. While there is always a chance that things will take longer than planned, we believe our experience will mitigate this.

Product Changes: As we refine Predator Warpaint based on additional community feedback and more product testing, slight changes may be made. We'll only make changes that enhance the product experience.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Besides waiting around for product, we have been extremely busy building new relationships and preparing to launch several new products.

Predator Warpaint Backers,
We can't thank you enough for all of your support and patience as we work to bring a superior camo face paint in the coolest new packaging to market. Over the past month, we have been hard at work finalizing our innovative Predator Tin and everything is now ready for production. We will be getting our first shipment of Tins at the end of May and shipping out all of the Kickstarter orders as soon as product arrives. We have also made preparations to send nearly 1,000 units out to Active Duty military across the US.

Hey backers, Nick here,
In less than 25 hours, we were able to exceed our $15K goal and we still have 43 days left to go!
Thank you to everyone who's supported the campaign so far, we cannot express how much we appreciate it. Predator Warpaint started as a vision to create something better for our military and now we are making it happen. This is only possible through your support so once again, thank you so much.

Hey backers,
We are more than two-thirds to our goal and still have 44 days to go! I just wanted to send out a quick thank you to everyone who has backed us & shared our campaign. It means so much to have your support as we create this new company.
If you haven't already, I'd really appreciate if you could help spread the word. Every share & tweet helps out our campaign immensely.

campaign.story:
If you missed our Kickstarter, you can now pre-order Ario.
Today's indoor lighting is static, as if the sun were fixed in the sky. This is unnatural and has significant implications to our sleep, mood, immune system, weight management, and overall well-being.
Ario is a WiFi-connected lamp and lighting system that mimics the light of the sun to keep your body clock in sync and improve your health.
Ario throughout the day
Ario uses advanced LED technology and cloud connectivity to make your life healthier and easier.
                                                Light Matters!
Humans evolved to live according to rhythms of the sun. We respond physically and mentally to the light around us. Today, we live in a world in which our sleep/wake cycles are easily disrupted. We often feel groggy in the morning, lethargic during the day, and restless at night.
Our bodies respond to light direction, color, intensity, and time, releasing hormones that control our body processes - physiology, sleep, metabolism, behavior, and mood. 
Based on over 15 years of scientific research from Harvard Medical School, NASA, and the NIH, Ario delivers lighting optimized for your health. 
We created Ario to help you -
Wake up naturally with sunrise-like lighting
Increase focus and productivity with energizing blue-rich light 
Relax in the evening with sunset-like amber lighting
Sleep better at night
Improve health: manage weight, reduce stress, increase antioxidant levels, and boost immune system
                                     Imagine Your Life with Ario
Ario provides a more natural way to wake up when you want to, with gently increasing light.
Blue-rich light energizes like a sunny day.
Ario's calming amber light creates a relaxing atmosphere.
Ario's downward-directed light prepares you for sleep. Ario can turn itself off or act as a nightlight that won't disturb sleep.
                                             How Ario Works
So, how does Ario actually work? We believe technology should make our lives simpler, not more complicated as many connected home devices currently do. Ario is easy to set up and use. Just plug it in.
Setup:
Plug your Ario lamp into the wall.
Connect Ario to your WiFi via a simple phone app.
Sit back and enjoy, while Ario figures out where you are and comes up with a lighting schedule that evolves with you over time.
Ario works automatically. If you unplug your lamp for days or weeks and plug it back in, Ario knows what to do, even if your WiFi is down.
Physical Control: User buttons (on/off, bright/dim, color) on the lamp or wall switch you already have.
Mobile and Web Access: Everything the physical controls do and more! You are in control of how to start and live your day.
Sunrise alarm
Time zone
Schedule update
Remote control
Color temperature range
What about data? At Ario, we believe the data Ario learns about you are yours! You can safely and securely access your data via your personal account to see how you are living and make daily adjustments to live healthier. 
Other cool stuff: Ario can help you prepare and recover from jet lag naturally. Ario is also compatible with other connected home devices and wearables. We would love to hear your thoughts on what you might want to connect with Ario, and the data it collects.
                                          Science Behind Ario
Decades of research from Harvard Medical School, NASA, and leading institutions around the world have revealed a great deal of information about how light impacts and regulates our health. We designed Ario based on this large body of knowledge and on recommendations of the National Institute of Health and American Medical Association. Here is a summary.
Our body learns what time it is from light in our environment. Non-visual photoreceptors in our eyes, discovered fairly recently, are sensitive to changing levels of blue light from above. These receptors provide signals to the suprachiasmatic nucleus (SCN), a tiny region located in the hypothalamus responsible for controlling our circadian rhythm, or body clock. This in turn influences the production of hormones regulating bodily process.
Today’s static artificial lights throw off our body clock by as much as three hours. While we don’t perceive this directly, this changes the balance of our endocrine system, generally reducing levels of body process regulating hormones both day and night. These changes to our basic physiology affect our metabolism which in turn impacts our sleep, behavior, mood, and general health.
Medical and lighting professionals recommend the following to promote healthy circadian rhythm, restful sleep, and overall well-being. Ario is designed to deliver what is recommended:  
Blue-rich light from above stimulates cortisol production in the morning to synchronize circadian rhythm and awaken, and during the day to maintain alertness.
Amber-toned light with very little blue and a relatively dark ceiling, at the end of the day. This makes it easier to relax and prepare the body for sleep by facilitating the release of the hormone melatonin which is inhibited by typical light exposure at night.
Examples of Those Who Have Seen the Light
NASA  Astronauts experience extreme light conditions in space, which result in circadian rhythm disruption. Over many years, NASA has learned how to use proper lighting to help astronauts compensate for significant changes in their sleep/wake cycles.
Seattle Mariners  Recently, the Seattle Mariners redesigned their clubhouse, introducing a state-of-the-art lighting system. Players now use blue light to recover from jet lag and prepare for games and amber light to help them wind down and recover afterwards.
                                                Our Innovation
We built Ario’s patent-pending combination of features specifically and uniquely to support your body clock while providing beautiful light. We’ve improved upon technology that has previously been complicated and expensive, making it available for personal use. By cloud-connecting Ario via WiFi, we enable a wide array of features that can grow over time.
Light delivery: We provide a bright, 2400 lumens, wide color range for Ario, from 6500K blue-rich white light (mid-day sun), to 1800K amber white light (candle/fire light). We selected high-performance LEDs used in large volumes by the general lighting industry to keep costs low and use custom light sources for the low end of the color range.
Directional control: Ario has two light engines, a purpose-built and highly-integrated LED controller, and Particle P1 WiFi module which together provide Ario’s lighting power and control. To get the most brightness while maintaining comfort, we’ve carefully engineered efficient large diffusers and properly shaded them to reduce glare.
Autonomous, easy control: Ario is equipped with a battery-backed real-time clock and program storage so it operates properly, and awakes after power-down knowing what color and direction are called for, even if your router or internet is down. Ario responds to buttons on the lamp, the switch on the wall, or remotely with your mobile phone, tablet, or computer.
Learning algorithms: Over time, Ario safely and securely identifies patterns in how you use the lamp through machine learning and refines its schedule to deliver lighting specific to your needs. It does this using cloud computing as part of the Ario web service available from anywhere.
Energy-efficient and long-lasting: Since Ario is solid-state, it uses only 1/5 of the energy of equivalent incandescent lighting. Our LEDs are properly driven and heatsinked to deliver more than 35,000 hours of life. The power supply is sized for minimum quiescent power draw and maximum overall efficiency. To save power further, Ario may be turned off completely like any lamp and still delivers light color and direction appropriate to your saved schedule.
                                                Ario Spec Sheet
                                                     Team Ario
                                                    Our Story
We started with a simple concept of improving people's health through lighting. We worked through countless research papers, development projects, prototypes, tests, and early marketing activities. We've received amazing encouragement and support along the way. Now we're ready to go to market and are asking for your help to gear up for manufacturing and development.
                                                     Timeline
                                                     Rewards
Rewards are explained on the right above.
Shipping cost will vary depending upon the location. Shipments within the US will be $25 and will vary anywhere else in the world. If we are not able to arrange shipping, we will reimburse contributors. VAT will need to be covered by the recipient.
Ario comes with a one-year limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.
                                                    Resources
We did a lot of research in the development of Ario. Our co-founder, Dale Dell'Ario, is a member of the Human Centric Design Committee and continues to learn and share what he knows. We encourage others to learn more, too. Some suggested resources are below.
Harvard Medical School
NASA's Research
f.lux
Economist 
Human Centric Lighting Committee (multiple articles)
How Sleep Works (Circadian Rhythms)
Seattle Mariners Club House (video)
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’re excited to launch Ario and can’t wait to deliver our lamp to you! We’re an experienced team of product developers and engineers and have already built prototypes, tested with over 150 people, and sourced our components manufacturers.

We're using contract fabricators with years of direct experience building custom parts like we've designed and assembling similar products to ours. In spite of our best efforts, you never know what might cause delays in manufacturing (component shortages, national holidays, etc.). While we may not be able to promise 100% accuracy on delivery dates, we promise transparency to keep our backers informed and up-to-date on our progress.

We've put a lot on the line for this initiative - our finances, our reputations, and our dreams. While we expect there will be twists and turns, we are committed to delivering on our promises.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Remaining Lamps are on the way!

updates.update_content:
Hi Backers,
Another batch of lamps just left the factory for the fulfillment house and will ship from there in about 5 days. If your backer number is 755 or less, you will be receiving your lamp shortly thereafter. 
 For backers with numbers higher than 755 or if you ordered from our website following the campaign, we do not have a definite date however we expect that it will be another 2 - 3 weeks.

Hello, backers! We’re excited that many of you have received your lamps and appreciate all the terrific feedback we’ve received over the past weeks. For those of you who have yet to receive your lamps, we thank you for your patience and are writing with some good news. Our supplier purchased more of the original acrylic resin from which we mold the diffusers, and we have moved the tool to a new molder to improve yields. What this means is that we will be completing your lamps in two runs close together, one next week, and another two to three weeks after that.

Good news. We started shipping the first Ario lamps this week! We carefully inspected the plastic diffusers and found that a number of them are good. As a result, we have been able to complete about a third of the lamps and are shipping to backers in the order of which they pledged. The first lamps have already shipped, and you should be receiving them any day now.

The app is ready for both iOS and Android, and Alexa Smart Home integration is ready to be validated so we can publish it. The production line is currently paused. With the line set up two weeks ago, and trial runs completed, all that was needed was to mold more diffusers for the lamp heads. We had scheduled pickup of the lamps for importation and fulfillment to you.
The big diffusers arrived defective and must be remolded. Plastic from previous runs generally remains in the molding machines and can turn to carbon which is hard to remove with normal cleaning between runs. It can flake off and is not usually seen in colored parts but shows readily in translucent ones. This is what happened and surprised us and our factory. In ongoing production, we would pull more parts from inventory. Since this line is still starting up, there is no backlog of inventory so parts must be remolded.

updates.update_userinfo: Final Assembly – please update your addresses
updates.update_content:
Hello backers,
Our apologies that getting back to you has taken longer than we had hoped. We have some good news. We’ve been working with the supplier for the metal stem sections of the lamp to improve the part quality and the machining accuracy which has taken some time. They have completely changed the processes used for machining the parts. Originally, they cut multiple parts together on a horizontal band saw which resulted in a good cut though with an accuracy of only plus or minus one degree. This doesn’t sound like much, but over the length of the stem, can be more than ¼”, and quite noticeable. The threading accuracy was similar and needed to be improved.

Hi Backers, here is where things stand with production of your lamps.
At the beginning of March, the UL inspector visited the assembly plant, reviewed one of several lamps built for verification, and granted approval to apply the UL mark to the product.  
Plastic tool problems we reported last update have been resolved and the tools weighing 7,300 lbs were shipped to our molder in Tijuana by air at great expense to speed things up. The tools were then set up and parts run, with the plastic diffusers completed a few days ago, and the parts that house the control electronics now.

Hi, Ario Backers!
Everything is coming together for your lamps! A few things are taking longer than we expected. We have completed the production verification run at our assembly plant. The units look great.

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Whenever there is a physical product involved, there is a lot of risks and challenges. Ever since we started working on Grasslamp, we received tons of positive feedback, and the typical reaction people had once they saw the lamp for the first time was WOW, its beautiful! Thats why we are ready to take on every challenge we face, so that in the end, we can offer the lamp to all of the people who said they want one.
We spoke with many supliers and manufacturers and identified the best solutions for manufacturing and assembling. We are ready to start with the production of the tools necessary for making the lamp, as soon as campaign ends. Even at this stage, we are partnering with engineers and production managers, making plans for production, and trying to foresee any possible issue before it happens.
Each of our suppliers and manufacturers is equipped to support large magnitude orders, and we are sure that with proper planning that we have in place, we can deliver in time. We will keep you in loop with everything thats happening, so feel free to reach out any time with questions, suggestions, notes, or simply to say hi. You will find us here on Kickstarter, website, facebook, twitter, instagram...Lets make our world a greener place together!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter
