campaign.story:
Our Kickstarter campaign is over! It's been an amazing 45 days and we're looking forward to getting production started.
To order some SilverAir Socks & Shirts, head on over to yathletics.com
Why you'll love the SilverAir Sock:
Our Story
Y Athletics was born on Kickstarter with the help and support of thousands of backers from over 70 countries. Our mission is to design and manufacture the highest quality products in each activewear category, using the best materials and technologies on the market. Simply put, we create products that are engineered for performance and insanely comfortable—you’ll never want to take them off.
We leverage cutting edge technologies like seamless knitting, which eliminates the need for stitches and ensures minimal irritation. Our fabrics are sourced from unique locations around the world, wherever innovation is occurring most rapidly. This includes yarns knitted with pure silver, which prevents odor from accumulating on your gear.
A year ago, we launched our first product - the SilverAir Shirt - and our fans helped us raise more than $250,000 to kickstart our dream. We’re frequently asked what’s next and now have an answer: 
After many months and hundreds of hours in development, we got the formula right and our next product is ready. We are proud to introduce the SilverAir Sock - It's beautiful. It's comfortable. It's odorless. It just works.

Development
This is a brand new fabric. We sourced the finest merino wool from Australia, known for its natural performance and odor-resistant qualities. But wool by itself is not soft enough, so we added acrylic for superior comfort, nylon for durability, and spandex for stretch recoverability. Finally, we blended pure silver on the areas that accumulate the most sweat, which takes the odor-fighting capability of this sock to a whole new level, unlike anything you’ve experienced.
After fabrication comes construction and we iterated until it was just right. We used seamless knitting to create a sock without any stitches and added vent panels that allow airflow to keep your feet cool and comfortable. The sock is beautiful inside and out. After you've worn it a few times, you won’t be able to go back to anything else.
Testing
We've been testing our socks rigorously over the last 9 months. A backer from our first campaign cycled 800 miles for two weeks wearing the same pair of SilverAir socks. A decathlon athlete wore them through his entire race and the socks stayed fresh. And, of course, we wear them every day ourselves. Every test led to improvement until we got them just right. 
Production
This is where you come in. We're still a young brand that's self-funded, and to bring these socks to market, we need to manufacture them at a moderate scale. Help us fund our first production batch of the SilverAir Sock and be the first to receive a pair... your support would mean the world to us.

How It Works
Where It's Made
We're proud to work with the best manufacturers in the industry. Here's where our socks and our shirts are made:

SOCKS:
SHIRTS:
Colors & Styles
SOCKS:
Thanks to you, we will now be offering our socks in six colors. Check them out: 
The Jet Black and Electric Blue are exact colors. The other 4 colors were unlocked as stretch goals and the colors shown are mock-ups. We'll show the actual socks in a future update.

SHIRTS:
For this campaign, our shirts will be available in the short sleeve crew and V neck styles in six colors - Carbon Black, Jet Grey, Surf Blue, Alpine White, Alloro Green and Marino Blue.
Measurement Guide
SOCKS: Our socks are unisex and will come in two sizes*:
*Due to a small number of our backers having a shoe size of 14 and above, we are going to be producing an XL size for shoe sizes 14-16. This size will only be available in our most popular color - Jet Black.

SHIRTS: Our shirt sizes are men-only for the time being. The shirts are fitted. We recommend sizing up if you prefer a loose fit.
*Carbon Black color may not available in the XXL size
**Please check our web-store for the latest measurements
Shipping / Delivery Schedule
Kickstarter backers will be receiving their shirts and their socks together. We estimate the following timeline:
MAY 2015 - Campaign closes. Backers' selections finalized.
JUNE 2015 - Raw materials are sourced and shipped to our factory.
JULY 2015 - Production period.
AUGUST 2015 - Finished products are shipped to our distribution center and on to your doorstep.
Where We Are
SOCKS - We've been working with our sock manufacturer for almost a year now. We've made and tested dozens of prototypes and feel confident in bringing them to you. The socks you see in pictures are production-ready and we'll start manufacturing them as soon as we are able to raise the funds for production.

SHIRTS - We have delivered thousands of shirts to the backers from our first Kickstarter campaign and continue to deliver shirts to customers every day. The production of our next batch of shirts will start soon and we want you to be the first to get your hands on them, at a deal exclusive to this Kickstarter campaign.

Help Us Spread The Word
We need your help to get the word out, so please help us by telling your friends and family about us. We also give away prototypes to our fans on facebook and twitter from time to time so keep an eye out...
International Backers
Carrier - We ship to most international countries via FedEx, to ensure the package is delivered to you safely in the shortest amount of time. If you would like to opt-in for another shipping method, please email us at hello@yathletics.com
Duties & Taxes - Please be aware that all international shipments are subject to duties and taxes by your government and you are responsible for paying that. All Kickstarter rewards will be declared 'gift', however, most countries will still assess a value and in certain cases FedEx will pre-pay the duties and taxes and bill you later.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is our second Kickstarter project and we have done our best to make realistic projections of the amount of raw materials we need, the time we need to receive them, and the time we need to manufacture the socks. However, manufacturing at the standards of Y Athletics has its own complications. Every single detail is scrutinized and we don't settle for anything less than perfection. The risk with that is that it if unavoidable production issues come up, the delivery of your rewards will be delayed.

With that said, we will make two promises:

1. We will deliver the highest quality product to each and every single backer. We take extreme pride in making some of the best products in the world and will never compromise on quality.

2. We will keep the lines of communication open at all times. If we have hurdles, you'll be the first to know about them. We encourage you to take a look at our communication with backers from our first Kickstarter project:

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/yathletics/silverair-odorless-athletic-shirts-made-with-pure/posts
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Introducing The SilverAir Merino Wool T-Shirt
updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone!
Two weeks ago, we launched our newest product and 7th Kickstarter campaign: The SilverAir Merino Wool T-Shirt - https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/yathletics/silverair-merino-ultralight-t-shirt-for-travel-and?ref=cv6am0
This is the lightest t-shirt we've ever made, with a double sided fabric that is one of a kind and exclusive to YA. It consists of 17.5 micron merino wool on the inside, combined with our signature SilverAir yarns. Together, they provide fantastic thermoregulation and take anti-odor performance to the next level.

Hey Backers!
I hope you all are having a fantastic day. We have a few exciting updates to share with you. If you have any questions, email us at hello@yathletics.com.
OUR UNCONDITIONAL PROMISE
We get emails and comments every day showing us the adventures you're going on and the fun you are having while wearing your SilverAir socks. That's what we made them for! And for that reason, we built them to last. If your socks wear through (i.e. get a hole) in the first year of wearing them, we'll send you replacements - no questions asked.

Dear Backers,

It's been an amazing journey and we’re so grateful for the opportunity to design products for you. Your support truly means the world to us. As always, there were a few small hiccups, but we hope you were satisfied with our transparency and the final product.

Today, we want to announce something exciting:

Hey everyone!
Here's a quick snapshot of the shipping status:

Hello Everyone!

It's been a little more than 2 weeks since our last update, so we'd like to share what's going on with deliveries. Since many of you already have the socks on your feet by now, we'll also share some information on what to expect as you use them. If you're wearing your SilverAir socks, we’d love to hear your early feedback.

Shipping
We started shipping on Tuesday the 22nd and have continued sending out socks every single day. Packaging and shipping is taking a bit more time that we initially anticipated. Here's a snapshot of our current shipping status:

Hey Everyone,
We plan to start shipping socks within the next week. There has been a small, unexpected hurdle which prevented us from shipping this week, and we just wanted to let you know about it:
We did some test deliveries and the boxes our socks ship in were getting crushed in transit. We immediately designed new packaging using corrugated cardboard which will protect the sock boxes. It's being manufactured this week and we hope to have it in our hands on Tuesday the 22nd and start shipping socks.

Hey guys!
Just wanted to give you a quick update and let you know that we're still on schedule to start shipping your rewards in mid September. September 14th is our target date to start shipping and we hope to complete shipping everything by the end of the month.
If you need to change your address or add/remove shirts and socks from the add-ons, you have until Tuesday (September 8th) to do that by going to https://silverair-socks.backerkit.com. We'll be locking in all orders after Tuesday and will be charging credit cards for those who have added shirts and socks through BackerKit.

Hello Everyone!
Thanks so much for taking the time to complete your surveys. If you haven't gotten a chance to complete it yet, please do so as soon as possible as we cannot ship your rewards if your survey is incomplete. If you haven't received the survey email, please check your spam folder. You can also visit this link to retrieve your survey: https://silverair-socks.backerkit.com

campaign.story:
Our campaign has closed
We didn't make our goal this time around, but we got a great response and sincerely appreciate all the support! We got a ton of great feedback and we're using it to develop even more awesome projects and kits.
You can join the conversation and check on our progress on our Facebook page or our website at pocketuniverses.com.
We set our goal based on the amount that we needed to develop and produce a first run of the circuit boards for these kits. We're going to use your feedback to regroup and see what we can do to make these cubes even better! Stay tuned because we've got a lot more yet to come!
Build a portal to your own world
What if you found a cube that is larger on the inside than the outside? What if you could create a portal to another universe and breathe life into it with beautiful, custom animations? 
Pocket Universes are worlds that you create. You can build a forest and control the weather, create a galaxy and control the starlight, or make glowing scenes of crystals and planets. We want to give you the tools to create fascinating scenes that grow and evolve over time.
How to create an infinite space
Assuming you don't want to go through the hassle of breaking the laws of physics, how can you create an infinite space? We use high-quality two-way mirrored acrylic to create the optical illusion of a space that goes on forever. The two-way mirrors reflect about 70% of the light that hits them; the rest passes through to the outside. The reflections bounce around inside the cube and create the illusion of infinite space.
Breathing life into your Universe
Our open-source LED animations allow you to design your own beautiful spaces inside your cube. They can pulse with energy, crackle with lighting, simulate the weather at home, and much, much more! The kits are Arduino-compatible, so you can even write new code to create totally unique and inspiring scenes.
We have created four kits to get you started on your journey of world-building. 
The Key and The Portal
The Key - A small 2in cube made from two-way mirrors
The Key is a small 2x2x2 inch cube and features a battery-powered LED that slowly cycles through the rainbow, illuminating the cube with vibrant color. It comes with a triangular base and your choice of one insert to add to the cube.
The Portal - a 4in cube with a programmable LED. The Key is shown on the left for comparison.
The Portal is a medium cube that measures 4x4x4 inches and includes a USB-powered LED that can run custom programming. The larger cube appears "deeper" because there is a larger space in each reflection.
It can pulse and glow, slowly change through custom color combinations, and much more! The board is Arduino-compatible. You can modify the open source code to take the animations in whatever direction you like! This cube also comes with a triangular base and your choice of insert.
Each cube comes with an insert of your choice to diffuse the LEDs and distribute patterns into the cube
There are six inserts to choose from for these cubes
The Forest and The Starlight
We're offering these kits so that you can build whatever universe you want!
The 6in Forest Kit includes the basic components to build a miniature world: trees, clouds, LED diffuser, and an additional mirrored top and bottom. LEDs mounted in the top can simulate the sky, or flip the cube over and light your scene from below. The kit also includes acrylic to diffuse the light, creating a more natural look.
These kits come with everything you need to get started. We built the circuit boards and the grid separately in our prototypes, but part of the funds for this campaign will go toward rolling them together into one custom board.
The 8 inch Starlight Kit allows you to create abstract galaxies using the effect of a cube within a cube. Because of the angles of the inner cube, the light seems to appear from a space beyond.
This kit contains everything you need to create both the outer 8 inch cube and the inner 4 inch Medium Cube.
We're desiging a custom circuit board
We want you to take these in your own direction. Our boards are open-source and Arduino-compatible. You can write new code, modify the board, or build your own remixes! 
We use individually-addressable LEDs that animate and change independently. The final boards will be powered over USB and easily reprogrammed for custom animations.
Our prototype circuit boards. We moved from the early boards on the left to drive the LEDs on to more feature-rich and specialized custom boards.
 We started with rough, handmade prototypes to test out custom animations. As we developed the kits, we also upgraded the boards, allowing us to add several additional features, like powering and programming the LEDs over USB and listening to an IR remote.
Here are some example projects
These kits are perfect for -  
Do-it-yourself maker and craft projects 
Building your own art pieces or furniture 
Showing off collectibles, scale models, or 3D prints 
Custom signs, logos, or nameplates
Educational projects to teach about optics and illusions
and much more!
Stretch Goals!
As we reach new fundraising goals, we'll be able to add new features.
$35,000 - Cube inserts! Pick 2 of the 6 inserts for the Small, Medium, and Starlight cubes.
$??? - We'll add an ambient light sensor to the Medium, Forest, and Starlight cubes so that it can become a night light.
$??? - More cube inserts! Pick 3 of the 6 inserts for the Small, Medium, and Starlight cubes.
$??? - New bases! Flat bases are now included with the Medium and Starlight cubes in addition to the triangular bases! Also, special white versions of the triangle bases will become available for the Small Cubes.
$??? - Audio input! We'll add an audio input jack to the circuit board and modify the animations to interact with the audio signal. If music is your passion, then put it in your universe!
$??? - A rainbow of bases! We'll introduce limited edition base colors so that you can have all the color combinations you love!
$??? - Wi-Fi - Control the cube kits from anywhere! Share and upload custom programs! Simulate the weather at home! More details on this coming soon...
Lighting and Care
Because of how the two-way mirrors work, the inside of the cube needs to be brighter than the outside for the mirror to be transparent, so the effect looks the best in low light. 
The acrylic, especially the coated side, cannot be cleaned with tissues, paper products, window cleaners, or other harsh chemicals. The cubes should be cleaned with the included microfiber cloth, which can be used dry or with a small amount of soapy water.
Our Story
The Road Cube - Part of our original series of cubes
Pocket Universes started as a collaborative project between Kat Moenk and Steven Sutton. Mixing art and science to create interactive art pieces, we are able to challenge each other to learn and develop new skills. 
We are also collaborating with Jan-willem De Bleser, an Electrical and Systems Engineer working in radar and aerospace. A hobbyist and tinkerer, he consulted on the Pocket Universe hardware in order to add more interactivity, flexibility, and features.
We also had huge help from Eric Deren of Dzignlight Studios, who did the amazing motion control shots in our video.
As requested, here is a dinosaur in the cube. For science.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Our team at Pocket Universes has already iterated through almost a dozen prototypes as we worked on the production process, animations, circuit design for these cubes. We've worked with expert Industrial Designers, Electrical Engineers, Entrepreneurs, and Manufacturers to ensure that our produce is designed for high-quality yet customizable manufacturing processes.

We consider the majors risks of the project to be:

Circuit Board Sourcing - For the circuit boards, we've selected components that are easily available from multiple sources, board designs with simple and clear tolerances, and we're working with professional service organizations to pick and place the board. We'll be using bed-of-nails testing to test power and program each and every board and we have plans in place for different scales of production.

Fabrication - We plan to do the fabrication ourselves on a small scale, but we will hire one of two fabrication services that we've talked with based on just how much we'll need to get done. We've worked through this project so that it can flex and expand to any scale we need.

Fulfillment - For fulfillment, we're working with a really great third party provider to ensure that our deliveries go out on time and stay cost-effective at any scale.

Setbacks do happen, so we plan to keep communication humble and open. If unplanned delays do happen, we'll communicate that out in updates with specific details and do our best to stay ahead of them.

We will have more information and updates available on our website at www.pocketuniverses.com

Thank you all so much for your support! Please click "Back this Project" at the top of the page to make this project a reality.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: More info on limited run cubes
updates.update_content:
Hello everyone! Looks like our campaign didn't make it this time around. We had lots of great feedback and support and we sincerely thank you all for the inspiration and encouragement!  
This was our first Kickstarter campaign ever and we learned so much from it! Even though we didn't make our goal, we got a ton of support and feedback and we're very motivated to keep moving forward! We have big plans and we'd love for you to stay involved.

updates.update_userinfo: Thank you all! Here's what we've learned and our next steps
updates.update_content:
Thank you all for supporting our campaign! We've reached the halfway mark on our funding and we're about halfway through our campaign. We've still got plenty more planned for the campaign, too!
If you're in the Atlanta area, come check out our show at MASS Collective this weekend, where we'll be showing off the prototypes and our original series, including a cube that you can control with your mind using a NeuroSky! We'll also be a the Decatur Arts Festival the following weekend.

updates.update_userinfo: We're halfway there!! Some things to look forward to...
updates.update_content:
Originally, we set up the new models of inserts for the Small and Medium cubes as stretch goals, where we would be able to unlock them in tiers. We thought that this would help manage the complexity of having different tooling/molds made for each new type of insert.
After showing the cubes this weekend and seeing how much people enjoyed playing with the inserts, we decided to rethink our process and figure out how to make them all available. We found a process to 3D print our molds and resin cast them that will allow us to improve our flexibility for which inserts we can offer.

Hello all! If you're in the Atlanta area next weekend, you can come check out our prototypes as well as our original art at this free event hosted by MASS Collective - https://www.facebook.com/events/419690758212930/
We'll have a gallery set up with our original artwork, the prototype Universes, and some amazing work by other MASS Members and Instructors. It should be a great time!

updates.update_userinfo: Check out our gallery show next weekend!
updates.update_content: We just launched yesterday and we can't believe that we're already over 20% funded! Huge thanks to all our backers for checking out our page and jumping on board with us! We're really excited to see where this goes!!

campaign.story:
PATENT PENDING
Makes an awesome chip clip to help with that cluttered pantry. We use them in our office as well to hang important mail or things we don't want to forget about.
Stick them under your hood while working on your vehicle. Use them with ladders while cleaning windows or painting.
Use them on the boat without the worry of them flying away. Use them while tailgating at your favorite events.
Cling them to your golf cart or toss it to the club!
Keep your towels off the ground on court and in the dugout.
3d drawings of each component that makes up Clingies. Thanks to Pillar design for all of their help.
To complete one working prototype the cost is around $250. We could have it 3d printed for cheaper but the materials are very weak and the clip would not be functional.
Thank you for the great support! Kickstarter is an amazing community and we appreciate each and every backer!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The risks with this project are minimal! This is a project that was created to fix a previous project that had unexpected fire hazards. Getting this project to this point has taken approximately 5 months and much more than the $1,500 funding goal. This project is going to happen, period. 

We are almost ready to push the green button and start production with our manufacturer. We have done our testing and know what needs to happen to get this amazingly simple product into your hands.

We want to give a special thank you to our original backers for giving us the thumbs up on launching this project to help cover the costs of the new molds and all of the unexpected costs involved with designing a whole new product.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Hi Everyone!
Well now that everything has shipped it's on to the next adventure!  I wanted to give you guys a heads up on my new project that just went live on Kickstarter.  Would love for you guys to check it out!

updates.update_userinfo: First large batch shipped out yesterday!
updates.update_content:
Hi Everyone!
Yesterday we shipped out about 2,500 clips of the 5,000 we have on hand!  Today we hope to ship the remaining out.  Saturday another 5,000-10,000 clips will be on the way from China and should be here by next Wednesday.  Then we will begin shipping those.  All of the shipments are shipped at random, in no particular order.  You will receive an email with tracking once your package is on it's way.  Thanks again everyone and we hope you enjoy your Clingies Clips!

Hi Everyone!
We received our first 5000 units and they look great.  Everything arrived in perfect condition and we are happy to announce we will begin shipping on the 28th.  Production for the next batch has already started and will be completed around the date we will begin shipping the first batch - On the 28th.  This will allow us to ship all orders at a smooth pace without any big gaps in shipping.  All of our original backers will have their rewards shipped first then the new backers.  After all of the problems and headaches this project has caused us we are finally at the end.  The next update you all will receive from me will be on the 28th telling you that orders have begun to ship.

Hi Everyone,
Just wanted to shoot out an update on production. Everything is moving along and the first shipment should go out on Tuesday. This first shipment will contain 5,000 units for me to review and look through the boxes to make sure I am satisfied with production. Initially I wasn't going to do this step but my production manager who is watching over everything suggested I do just in case there is something I don't approve or like. This is also to ensure that the products ship without damage the way they are packaged. This additional step will kill another week unfortunately but I think it's a wise choice. Hopefully we don't have any issues and can cruise through customs quickly as well. Below are some pictures of production packaging.

Hi Everyone!
Exciting news! Production Kicked off yesterday! FINALLY, after all of the headaches and struggles we are almost done and I can deliver your LONG awaited rewards. Here is what I received as far as a timeline goes. Please keep in mind that we have not produced these in large volumes thus far so I would give them a few days to get things rolling along. I will keep you all up to date once I get more feedback from production. I will comment in the comment section of this update until bigger news arrives.

Hello Everyone!
Finally actual production clips in hand! Please see the photos below. I just want to make sure you are all good with the way they look. I really think they look great. You can see the parting line in the mold which can be fine tuned if you guys think this needs to be done. I learned a lot on this project about over molding and parting lines. I would rather they didn't exist but the more products I look at I notice its on nearly everything. Guess I didn't pay much attention before. Oh one more thing, I think I will go with a little darker grey color for the grip. Either way just comment and say you like them or you think they should look better. The Docking Dots are perfect!

Hi Everyone,
I received more pictures from production. The project manager told me everything is looking great but they are running a little behind on the completion schedule. The production samples should be shipped to me express on Friday. This will allow me to physically hold in my hand exactly what all of you will receive. I will be sure to take pictures and share once I get them.

Well we are finally in the final stages and production is getting close. As you know there were some changes that had to take place in order for us to sonic weld the magnet housing to the clip. The work on the tool is almost done and I can't wait to have a true production Clingies clip in my hand - Im sure many of you feel the same. It won't be long now. The most recent update from the manufacturer says I should have a batch to begin shipping by the end of the month (I'm scared to say anything because it seems as if this project is cursed).  Anyways, all is good at this point and I wanted to share some pictures and info with you guys!

Hi Everyone!
I wanted to thank each and everyone one of you for the great support throughout this project and a HUGE thank you to the original backers who have continued to support us through this project! campaign.story:
“This thing is exceptional. High quality and precession craftsmanship. It’s everything that was promised.” – Anthony Mendez
“This is one of the best things I’ve received from Kickstarter. Really impressed with the quality and well worth the wait.” – Victor
“Today I experienced the unexpected and I am glad that mininch was in my bag (^_^) “ – Ibnu Salim
“Excellent service and what an incredible tool this is! Thank you for making this tool.” - Hans van Gent
“The only thing wrong is that I should have got one for my wife, I can see it going “missing” before to long.” – Steve Buddell
Thank you very much for supporting our Tool Pen project in 2014. We couldn’t make it a reality without you. We are sincerely grateful and highly proud that you love your Tool Pen as much as we do. It motivates us to work harder for making more good designs unremittingly.
In prior amazing Tool Pen journey, many backers fed back that they desired the smaller or jeweler sized bits for fixing some electronics, intricate equipment, mobile devices, glasses, and wristwatch, to name just a few. We heard all your voices, and we obviously loved these ideas. Since then, we have begun studying how to shape the mini-sized version Tool Pen, and we’ve been tirelessly working away on developing it after the last project was finished.
As you imagine, these new mini bits are smaller and thinner than original ones which need the different type of mechanical & product design. Aside from that, lots of recessed screws on small electronics or some equipment are hard to be reached, thus a slender tip of the pen is quite necessary as well. After a rigorous assessment, we decide to create another sturdy, but svelte pen to handle all precision bits in the best way.
And definitely, we still stay the smartest “Pop-A-Point” design of Tool Pen. Rather than carrying many screwdrivers or a box full of bits, now you can flexibly collect and interchange all demanding bits like replacing refills of a pen. The bits will be compactly stacked within the barrel, and cycling them through is pretty fast & simple. It’s lightweight & portable that you’ll easily carry around and use it on the go.
One of the best things is all great features are retained. The bits sizes & icons are printed on all sides, and the window shows which ones are inside. The cap is going with a strong magnet built-in as well, to prevent leads getting damage and protect you from accidentally stabbed. What’s more, we add a pocket “Clip” on cap for Tool Pen mini. Hooray!
Trust us, everyone will agree again it’s a very polished pen in your hand.
This is the kind of mighty yet stylish multi-tool that makes your works more impeccable. Each Tool Pen mini holds up to 5 bits. The pen body is machined by aluminum with sand-blasting finish, and there are still three beautiful colors – Snow Silver, Gunmetal, & Champagne Gold for your choices. They will be absolutely the perfect companions with your EDCs.
On the other hand, we upgrade the material of these precision bits to high-quality “S2 TOOL STEEL”, which they are harder, stronger, and super durable for frequent use. There’re 21 types of bits that applied to Slotted (Flat), Phillips, Star (Torx), Torx Security, Hexagon (Hex), Square, and Pentalobe screws. You can flexibly work on fixing multiple devices including small electronics, game console, laptop, tablet PC, mobile phone, toys, Meccano, music equipment, glasses, wristwatch, appliances, remote controller, as well as many household gadgets & personal ornaments etc. with a single “all-in-one” pen anytime & anywhere.
Bits
  Material: S2 TOOL STEEL
  Length: 35.6 mm  /  Diameter: 7.1 mm  /  Weight: 4.5 g
  Spec: 21 types are offered in first phase
Slotted Bits (Flat): SL1.5, SL2, SL2.5, SL3
Phillips Bits: PH00, PH0, PH1
Hexagon Bits (Hex): H0.9, H1.3, H1.5, H2 
Torx Bits (Star): T6, T7
Torx Security Bits: TR8, TR9, TR10
Square Bits: S1
SIM Eject Tool: 0.8
Pentalobe Bits: P2, P5, P6
Pen
  Material: 6061 aluminum, sand-blasting finish.
  Length: 133.5 mm  /  Diameter: 12.8 mm  /  Weight: 46 g (with 5 bits inside)
  Colors: Snow Silver, Gunmetal, Champagne Gold
The product you see here is actually the 3rd-run prototype we did. Developing this mini version was more difficult than what we originally assumed. The major challenge we met was the complexity of mechanical design for applying Pop-A-Point mechanism to this smaller pen & jeweler bits, not to mention that the tooling & CNC process for making precision items were also much tougher. So, we worked with our manufacturing partner (the same one who supported Tool Pen project) and attended to every detail over the past months. In the meanwhile, we were also knee-deep in executing on mass production of Tool Pen (and it was successfully fulfilled by last November). Frankly, we were almost burned out during that overlap period!
Fortunately, all efforts we paid were fairly worthy, this Tool Pen mini was finally come up. As mentioned, the material of bits has been upgraded to higher class "S2 TOOL STEEL". Besides, we change the shape of pen body being cylindrical, and mill additional flatten surfaces to enhance the frictional force and bring a close grip feeling. And the most important is our new design will make your Tool Pen mini dapper, lighter, and super-smooth for Pop-A-Point operation as well. We love it, and we believe you’ll fall in love with it, too!
Our products are designed and manufactured in Taiwan. We partner with a high-quality & 30-year-experience manufacturer who is professional in making wide-range screwdrivers & tools. With utmost efficiency and stringent quality gates along each step of the way, we are confident to fulfill this project and deliver your rewards on September, 2015. Here is our schedule & execution plan –
We are a small team named “mininch” (pronounced by “mini-inch”), and all key members have great credentials with complimentary expertise in design, manufacturing, marketing, & project management. Some have also won numerous awards including iF product design award & Red Dot design concept award etc. Converging everyone’s profession & experience, we aim to create good designs for improved lifestyles, moving from concept to production.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Although Tool Pen mini is the 2nd version of prior greatly-made Tool Pen, it’s still a brand new product that will be constructed and manufactured from scratch. There’re some potential risks & challenges such as tooling delay, component shortage, or any unexpected situation we may meet for ramping up. Fortunately, it’s not our first Kickstarter campaign. We have learned many experiences and we also have proven track record in project management & reward fulfillment. We’ll try best to make sure that all executions live up to our plan & preparation. 

In addition, we’re used to make everything transparent, thus the overall milestones & progress will be open to track by updates. So, if there’s something unforeseen, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work diligently to solve the problems as soon as possible. 

We’re ready now, please join us on this awesome journey again. Thank you very much!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Dear backers,
2020 has been an uncertain and challenging year, but we still tried to use our expertise to make this world a little bit better. With our experiences, we have been helping other innovative fellow creators branch out to wider markets via Kickstarter. We carefully selected these up and coming brands, and we would like to share with you three awesome projects that we involved in and executed.

updates.update_userinfo: Two Projects We Recommend. Stay Safe & Warm!
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
At a time the world was experiencing varying levels of uncertainty, and everyone has been affected by the global outbreak of COVID-19. We do hope you and your family are safe and healthy, and most importantly... be positive! Therefore, we still kept prototyping our new ideas, and we also created a new service model of offering product design & project consulting to our hometown creators. Today we’d like to share two awesome projects that we got involved and helped organize their Kickstarter campaigns, so bear with us to post them via update once.

updates.update_userinfo: Last Chance to Get a Taste of The Mighty Spinner Drive (Final 72 Hours)
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
With the support of 2600+ backers, our project Spinner Drive has raised more than $180,000+ and become an imminent reality, thank you so much for all your help. If you haven’t checked it out yet, we recommend you pay it a visit soon because there’re only 3 days left before this awesome campaign finishes.

updates.update_userinfo: Spinner Drive 1500+% Funded & BLACK Tool Pen Launched
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers,
It’s been an unreal journey since we launched our new project “Spinner Drive” three weeks ago. So far, we’ve raised over USD$110,000 and got quite a bit of positive responses from mainstream media like Fast Company, HiConsumption, New Atlas… etc. We want to thank each and every one of you who have supported us from the very beginning. We couldn’t be where we are without you.

Dear Backers,
Great news. The Spinner Drive is now live on Kickstarter! Come pay us a visit -
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/2054052511/spinner-drive-infinite-possibilities

Dear Backers,
Hope this mail finds you well.
For the past few months, we’ve been working on a brand new concept that we think you’ll love and want to get your hands on. It’s got quite a few tricks up in its sleeves and we’re more than excited to share it with you.

updates.update_userinfo: All spare parts / accessories are up on new mininch.com
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers:    
Greetings! Hope all is well. 
It has been years since the first Tool Pen was published, we’re glad to hear many backers still used it at all times, and we got lots of inquiries about the needs of more bits, wrenches, or certain accessories, so we never stopped studying or developing some new items to enhance the functions & applications. Ex - the initial Tool Pen only had 13 bits, and there’re total of 27 bits at present. It’s echoed with our design philosophy – making our products strong & durable for lasting a lifetime.

Dear Backers:   
The year 2017 is almost over, we hope you had a bountiful year and most of your wishes did come true. In this year, we had successfully published a new project “Xcissor Pen”, its production is currently underway, and we aim to deliver all rewards in March, 2018.  
As for Tool Pen trilogy, they were still very popular and had been selected as the best gadget / gift by many well-known media like WIRED, designboom, Everyday Carry, Outside Magazine… etc. People can easily find or buy Tool Pens from dozens of stores / online shops in 20+ countries around the world (http://www.mininch.com/find-a-store).

updates.update_userinfo: Art Knife Module - A whole new design (Special Edition & Add-On) ; Updated new bits gift program
updates.update_content:
Dear Backers:   
Some backers fed back they didn’t use pen very often. We heard your voices, so we kept thinking and creating great new features to make our Xcissor Pen more powerful. Although there’re only 8 days left before the project ends, we’re still pleased to publish a whole new design – Interchangeable “Art Knife Module” switched with the pen nib.

@Anson: If you have issues pulling the top bit out, try pushing an extra bit into the base to give you a little extra leverage. campaign.story:
The Vulcan-1 engine is a bigger, better, but completely different design compared to our original Tri-D engine. We were the first students in the world to design, print, and test a 3D printed rocket engine, and now we are going bigger! The Vulcan-1 will be placed into the rocket body and launched in June making us both the first student organization to do so as well as the record holders for highest flight of a rocket powered by a 3D printed engine.
TODAY IS THE LAST DAY OF OUR CAMPAIGN!!!!! We thank all our generous backers, but we still believe WE CAN DO MORE!!! Time is running out to make yourself a part of history!!!
Above are the design specifications for the Vulcan-1 Rocket Body. We believe that with this design we can achieve an altitude of 10,000 feet!
Vulcan-I brings with it new and exciting technologies to the aerospace industry, which have the potential to challenge the field's landscape. It’s not only because we are a group of undergraduate students designing a liquid fueled rocket engine with 750lbs of thrust that makes this project unique; it’s how we are building it. 
Like its predecessor, Tri-D, Vulcan-I is one out of a handful of 3D printed engines in the world. The very fact that students can design, print, and test a 3D printed rocket engine at a professional level is revolutionary. And why is that so exciting? Because it proves that students are capable of so much more than we realize! We are on our way to being the first organization to successfully launch a 3D printed rocket engine, and it would all be thanks to your support.
Our accomplishments have the potential to revolutionize how space is reached. 3D printing dramatically lowers the cost of the most expensive part of rocketry, the engine. It also could prove to the world that we are more ready to be an interplanetary species than ever before. The possibilities are only limited by our imagination, but we need your help to get off the ground!
Any level of funding can put YOU as a part of scientific history. Your contributions will go entirely toward our building of Vulcan-1 and helping us students show what humanity can do!
 
From the entire SEDS team, we would like to thank you for your contributions. Your support will not only help us build a rocket body, it will help us shape how humanity gets into space! Our progress both changes space travel and develops our practical and professional skills.
Also, thank you to Minute Physics and TMRO for spreading the word about our mission!
Thank you to our Corporate Sponsors
 Thank you to our Advisers
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Being students, time is a commodity of which we have precious little. Our primary concern is with the fulfillment of donation packages that contain Vulcan-1 memorabilia. Since we are receiving the donation perks from numerous suppliers they will have to be condensed and prepared to ship to you, our supporters. We have seen this coming and are working with UCSD and logistical solution providers to ensure this process is as seamless as possible. Thank you again for your support and know we will be doing everything in our power to ensure that you receive your promised Vulcan-1 memorabilia in a timely fashion.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hello backers! You read that right! The status of The Vulcan has been progressing rapidly. We are excited to announce that we are several days away from launch, planned for early this Saturday morning! Beyond that, we will be livestreaming the entire launch! To tune in, visit the following link Saturday morning between the hours of 9am-12pm PST for the live launch feed:
sedsucsd.org/launch

updates.update_userinfo: Video Update! Vulcan Construction and Testing
updates.update_content: Hi all, this is Bryan Dierking again. We had a productive build this weekend! I filmed fellow team members along the way and edited a video update for everyone. Enjoy!

Hi all, my name is Bryan Dierking. I have been involved with Vulcan from the very start, but only on the engineering side. Our business team, who helped organize this campaign, say that everyone on Kickstarter would appreciate more frequent technical updates as we approach out launch date, so I volunteered! 
Every time I walk by our printer, it's printing out awesome rockets for everyone, so although this isn't my department, I know they are on their way and looking good!

Hello,
We are very sorry for the delay in shipping out rewards. We are working every chance we get to get them shipped out to you, and please accept our sincerest apologies. We have begun boxing rewards and will be shipping them out as they are boxed.
In other news we had engineers out from NASA come visit us and they were super impressed by what we are accomplishing! None of it could be done without you, and we are working to get all rewards shipped out ASAP

Hello Backers!
DON’T FORGET TO INPUT YOUR SHIPPING INFORMATION ON BACKERKIT!!
the link will be in an email you should have received on August 6th

Hi Backers!
Though we have had our ups and downs, we here at SEDS UCSD are still working very hard to make sure our rocket is ready for launch as soon as we feel our rocket can have a safe and successful flight. Naturally, as this is a detailed and complex engineering project many small things can go wrong over the course of tests and construction, which obligates us to spend the extra time and effort in order to be comfortable to launch the rocket.

updates.update_userinfo: BackerKit is LIVE + Featured in Space.com!
updates.update_content:
Hello Backers,
We sincerely apologize for not being able to send out an update on the launch sooner, but fear not, here it is.
Since the completion of the Kickstarter we were in the fabrication phase of the Vulcan-1 rocket, getting ready to attend the Intercollegiate Rocket Engineering Competition (IREC) held by the Experimental Sounding Rocket Association (ESRA) near Green River, Utah on June 24-27th with a scheduled launch date of June 26th.

Hello Backers!  
We are so excited to share that we expect to launch our rocket at the Experimental Sounding Rocket Association (ESRA) competition in Green River, Utah TODAY!  
It has been a busy month here at UCSD. Our team worked around the clock to get this rocket built and ready (not exaggerating). Assuming all launch conditions are acceptable, we will be able to get this thing in the air this afternoon! This is very exciting, but none of it could have been accomplished without your support.

Hi Backers!
Some of you did not receive this update so we are re-posting it. We here at SEDS UCSD are hard at work with building the rocket YOU FUNDED! SEDS members have been working 24/7 on the rocket this week and will continue to do so until the launch!! We are so grateful for all your generosity!!!

campaign.story:
A sincere THANK YOU to all the Kickstarter backers that made our dream a reality and helped us bring HYDAWAY to the world!
If you missed the Kickstarter campaign, fear not, you can now order your HYDAWAY Collapsible Water Bottle on our website. Just click the button below.
Connect with us to stay up to date on HYDAWAY for giveaways, exclusive deals, and more!
Email Us                  Newsletter                  Facebook                  Twitter
Now we can give everyone a convenient, safe, and environmentally-friendly way to drink more water!
     In just 60 seconds, U.S. consumers use and throw away 90,000 disposable water bottles. That’s 50 billion water bottles per year – or – 30 million TONS of plastic waste each year in the U.S. alone. 
But most of these bottles are recycled, right? Unfortunately not. 
At least 80% of that plastic ends up in our landfills, streets, parks, and beaches.
HYDAWAY™ is an easy-to-use, reusable water bottle designed for people with active lifestyles who are searching for an alternative way to carry water that's just as convenient as buying bottled water.
With your HYDAWAY, we think it’s possible to make a difference, and we think you’ll agree. 
                                                 Fits into virtually any pocket
Travel-friendly design
Helps parents stay organized
                                                
How to expand the bottle
How to collapse the bottle
HYDAWAY is great when traveling
Are you frustrated with airport security confiscating the water bottle you brought for the flight?
Now you don’t have to be.
Use the HYDAWAY Bottle to stay hydrated on the way to the airport. Before you approach the TSA security line, finish any water left in your bottle, fold down the HYDAWAY into a thin disc, and simply slide it into your carry on.
Once through security, pop open your HYDAWAY bottle and find the nearest water fountain or filling station. Fill up your HYDAWAY and you’re on your way!
Feedback from a beta tester
HYDAWAY is great for the active family
You don’t have to be super mom (or dad) to keep your kids hydrated on-the-go with water instead of unhealthy sugary drinks. 
Packing up your kids for a long day at school? 
Skip the high-calorie juice or sports drinks and pack the watertight HYDAWAY instead. Fill it full of water or leave it empty and collapsed. Your child can easily expand it and fill it throughout the day. 
Planning a day of family fun in the sun? 
HYDAWAY is a safe and convenient alternative to bottled water with a size to quench the thirst of every member in your family. Simply pack a HYDAWAY for you and the kids, and you’ll be a hydration hero!
Feedback from a beta tester
HYDAWAY is great for staying fit
The HYDAWAY can go virtually anywhere and everywhere with you. Take your new hydration companion on a day hike, freeing up your hands for taking pictures and enjoying nature the way it was intended. The carry handle easily attaches to a key chain or backpack.
Store your HYDAWAY in a gym bag and take it with you when heading out to a yoga class or the gym. When you are finished with your water, simply fold up your HYDAWAY into a thin and compact disc that fits in your pocket or waist band. 
Feedback from a beta tester
What’s your HYDAWAY story? 
We’d love to hear from you on how you will use your HYDAWAY. Can you think of how a HYDAWAY fits into your active lifestyle?  SHARE to Facebook, Twitter, or Email us!
Choose from two sizes: Large (21 oz/600 ml) and Small (12 oz/350 ml)
           Whether you’re a frequent flier, a mile-a-minute mom, a weekend warrior or just someone who thirsts for thoughtful design, HYDAWAY fits the life you live. No more lugging around bulky “empties”, no more disposables in landfills, no more hard to clean bottles. HYDAWAY is flat out ready to go, whenever and wherever. Are you?
 
Compare HYDAWAY to other types of water bottles



BUSY LIVES CALL FOR CONVENIENCE
As a husband, father of two kids, and an outdoor enthusiast, I am always on the go. My job as a product designer requires me to travel frequently, meeting clients all over the globe.
Like many of you, I do my best to live a healthy lifestyle and a large part of health is proper hydration. I am also committed to minimizing the impact my family makes on the planet, and strive to set a positive example for my children.
But I found that without a superior alternative, resisting the temptation to buy bottled water while on-the-go was very challenging.
Whether it’s in the airport jumping between connecting flights, or taking a day trip with the kids in tow, I needed a water bottle that could fit my active lifestyle.
ALTERNATIVES TO BOTTLED WATER
What are the alternatives to disposable bottled water that are eco-conscious, reusable, simple to use, convenient to carry, and easy to clean?
Metal water bottles are sustainable since metal is recyclable, and most are labeled as BPA-free, but they are heavy, loud, and their bulkiness make them difficult to carry and pack away.
Plastic reusable water bottles are mostly BPA-free these days, but are also bulky and inconvenient to store.
Foldable, hand-held bladders seemed to be the most convenient alternative to the bulkiness of a bottle, but they tip over easily and when it came to cleaning them, it was an absolute nightmare.
As you can imagine, when I thought about “superior alternatives,” none of these options seemed superior to me! 
THE VISION
Traveling on yet another flight home from a long business trip, I had a vision of a water bottle that was ergonomic like a traditional bottle, and would fold up to fit into my pants pocket or messenger bag. 
I knew this bottle design could be 100% BPA-free, taste and odor-free, easy to clean, and best of all, would fold up into a thin compact disc that could be stored virtually anywhere while on the go.
My mind was spinning with the possibilities!
THE BREAKTHROUGH
After two years of racking my brain considering how I could help to change the way we think about disposable bottled water, I finally had an honest, fully-functional water bottle design worth sharing: The HYDAWAY. 
Now my passion in life (besides my family) is to share this product with you, and the world. Won’t you please join me? 
As a backer of this campaign, you are making a commitment to: 
Drinking more water and fewer sugary drinks to live a healthier lifestyle! 
Reducing the amount of plastic we add to our landfills and oceans, by cutting down on the 50 billion disposable bottles we throw out each year!
Reducing our dependency on oil, by cutting down on the 17 million barrels of crude oil that go into making plastic bottles each year!
Together we can give everyone a convenient, safe, and environmentally-friendly way to drink more water! Thank you in advance for your support.

Niki Singlaub
Creator of the HYDAWAY Collapsible Bottle
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
We’re so passionate about this project, that we’re committed to doing everything in our power to solve any challenges that may arise along the way – that’s a promise! 

Here are a few risks and challenges that we can think of:

Product Manufacturing Delays

• We’ve produced a small run of samples and we feel confident that a large production order will be successful; however, it is common that factories can have unforeseen setbacks. 
• We plan to stay in constant communication with our manufacturer including working on-site to resolve any challenges that may arise.

Shipping Delays

• Shipping a large number of products at once can be a daunting task for a small team.
• To help us with this challenge, we’ve segmented the shipping process into groups.
• Early birds will get their products first. Regular orders will get their products second. All other orders will be processed as soon as possible after the Kickstarter orders have been sent out.

Lost Packages

• We’ve had some experience shipping products internationally, including lost packages.
• Even if it means sending out a product three times, we are committed to make sure it gets into your hands.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

It's been too long since our last update.  With Earth Day approaching (April 22), all of you have been on my mind.  We launched our successful Kickstarter campaign three years ago!! and you helped me to start this initiative which has allowed thousands of people all over the world lead a more sustainable lifestyle, free from single-use plastic bottles.

Hello HYDAWAY Kickstarter Backers!

Hello Backers!
I hope summer is treating everyone well and you are staying well-hydrated with your HYDAWAY bottles wherever your adventures take you! I have two exciting pieces of news to share in this update.
As you may recall, nearly 40% of our backers live outside the United States. So it's important that we find ways to offer our convenient hydration solution around the world. That's why I'm excited to announce that

Happy Anniversary, backers! 
That’s right, one year ago, today, you helped me realize my dream and together, we started a company from scratch. I’m still feeling the high, even one year later! 
Boy, so much has happened in the past 365 days. We built production tooling, we made lots and lots of bottles, we shipped them all over the world (slowly but surely), we found retail stores to carry our products, we sold out our inventory (twice), and just this month we are hiring our first employee! Phew!

campaign.story:
Kind Words from the Press & Our Backers:
OlivePR: "At Olive, we are so honored to be able to work alongside Hanna and the OH! Juice team. They truly are a business that is leaving an impact on people’s lives and we love sharing their story and illuminating the greatness of OH! Juice for the world to see."
CBGW: "The ownership and management of Carlsbad Gateway Center is excited to welcome OH! Juice and Hanna Gregor as the newest member of our high-end specialty food community here at our business park. Hanna's enthusiasm and dedication to her exceptional product line truly enhances our vision to grow a local collection of entrepreneurs offering top quality, wholesome food product."
The Dailey Method: "We couldn't ask for a better partner than OH! Juice. The combination of their knowledge in nutrition and their premium juices with our variety of fitness classes offers our collective client base a one stop shop for all of their health and wellness needs."
 The vision of OH! Juice was clear from the start, we knew if our core values shaped our decision making we would end up with a product people loved and truly needed. OH! Juice is off to a great start with a popular product line, loyal following and dedicated team, but now it's time to continue our success by expanding and reaching a larger demographic with a stable infrastructure! 
Starting off in the local farmer's markets we only hoped that people were going to love our nutritionally designed organic juices and the education to go along with them. It turns out that people in San Diego were looking for just that; a product that didn't cut any corners with educators to assist through all of the confusing "claims" of other products.
In the beginning when there were limited staff there were nights when we didn't think we were going to get out of the kitchen alive. We said things out loud we didn't mean, we tripped, fell, and dropped many juices due to exhaustion. This journey has certainly tested our physical demand as well as our mental toughness. 
With the little to no money in our pockets you can imagine the stress, to keep everyone on payroll and to keep the customer's juice flowing. Doubts and worry try to trump our thoughts constantly, but we have to push that all aside to keep going. Being vulnerable and asking for help is a very difficult thing but we've had no other choice but to be resourceful and find what OH! Juice needs to thrive.
This happened at 4 a.m. before deliveries, GOOD MORNING!
Meet Hanna: At the start of this campaign Hanna turned 26 years old and has already accomplished a lot so early by starting OH! Juice and leading the juice industry in San Diego. She is determined to keep growing by helping those around her accomplish their goals too. Graduating from The Pennsylvania State University in 2012 with a B.S in Nutritional Sciences gave Hanna the education the juice industry so desperately needed. Her taste for quality and competitive edge insures that each bottle is the best it can be. Hanna's vision is fueled by the results and testimonials she receives from her clients and can't wait to distribute her juices into as many new hands as possible.
Meet Anna: Anna is actively pursuing a personal state of Chidananda, a state of blissful consciousness, through the incorporation of organic diet, yoga, meditation, and continuous education. Earning her B.S. in Nutritional Science from The Pennsylvania State University expanded her understanding of what it takes to make the finest juice on the planet. OH! Juice has allowed Anna to share her knowledge with others so that they might attain their ideal self. Her extensive experience with a clean lifestyle, along with world travel and culinary arts allow her to provide a unique perspective and help shape the vision of the OH! Juice team.
HPP (high pressure pasteurization) is a new technology that bigger companies looking to grow fast through higher profits are using to extend their shelf life. Investors say plastic bottles equal more immediate profits but we say glass bottles are what the consumer appreciates and demands. They say HPP will make our juices last longer, meaning more profits but we say HPP is misleading; our customers want juices that are truly raw, vibrant, and freshly made within hours of their purchase. 
We are trying to create a business that will survive the marketing trend of juicing with all of the misleading propaganda and provide a product that provides consumers with what they need, with juice that yields the results that they expect.
"The longer the shelf life, the shorter yours!"
Many investors approach us because they fall in love with the branding, the creators behind it, or they see the trend in juicing and health on the rise. This puts us in a tight spot; causing us to contemplate our mission, values and the burning energy inside. In the end we know we have to respectfully decline these offers with confidence, knowing we'll find the right type of support that will take OH! Juice in the direction that is best for the health of our clients, the environment, and our souls. 
Cover of Discover SD as the "Leading Ladies of Juice"
Now that we've stuck to our plan and created a truly amazing product we have clients who can't get enough juice and want it on a more regular basis. With school loans over our heads, and a small chance for a business loan this early in the game we naturally can't afford a storefront with the high overhead and initial costs, but that's okay because this financial roadblock has lead us to be innovative and distribute our juices in other ways then the traditional storefront model. 
We teamed up with The Dailey Method San Diego who turned out to be a crucial partnership to OH! Juice. They allowed us to house our refrigerator full of juice and serve as a micro-storefront so our clients could have a pick up option for juices outside of the weekend farmer's markets.
As far as we've come, we've only just scratched the surface of what's possible with OH! Juice. We plan to expand our product line and cater to a larger demographic and range of health needs. We need your help to take it further, and make our vision a reality. Pledge money will go towards the following:
Private Production Facility
First things first, we need to lease our own private production facility! This will allow the freedom to produce during the hours most humans like to work. We currently work late at night, in the freezing cold (winter) or the blazing heat (summer). We've faced theft and damage in our current shared kitchen and it's time for us to have our own space to thrive. 
A couples months ago an opportunity for a wonderful space was presented to us. At first we restricted ourselves and the company by saying it wasn't in OH!'s near future and worried about the money that would go into the buildout of the kitchen. But then the gears started turning and we realized that timing will always be an excuse and that we had to make a leap and rise to the challenges ahead. Carlsbad Gateway Center believes in our vision because they signed a lease with us after patiently waiting 3 long months to save up everything we had for the down payment (school loans will just have to wait!)  We signed knowing it was time to take it to the next level, we signed because we want to make 10x more juice, we signed because we can't wait to show you what we have in store.. 
Thankfully a talented and local architect generously scrambled to help us design plans for the new space and now we're off to the races! We have pulled together all the resources we could in order to get this project started and now we need your help to finish it by furnishing it! 
NEW FACILITY DESIGN, please OH! please!
Inside we will need the following to be compliant and up to health code:
 2, 3-compartment sinks- $3-5,000, Craigslist or Webstaurant 
2 hand washing sink- $400, Webstaurant
Walk-in cooler- $12,000 
96 ft of commercial grade racks w/ wheels- $2,000, Webstaurant
50 ft of stainless steel prepping tables- $3,000, Craigslist & Webstaurant   
FRP (type of wall layering for easy wiping)- $1,500 + Installation, $500, Home Depot 
Mop sink- $250
Secret piece of machinery that we would not like to expose to competitors- $4,000
Bottling equipment- $3,500
Water Heater- $1,800
Office furniture, Employee lockers, etc.- $1,100
Display Cases for the Juices - $4,300
Transportation
Secondly, we will need a reliable source of transportation. We currently deliver in an old astro van that isn't insulated, we use coolers and lots of ice to keep the juices cold as we make the deliveries. This makes for a very physically demanding day as well as an inefficient system due to the heavy loading coolers and the lapsed time of preparing deliveries out of the back of the van. The van is old and gives us problems every month creating unnecessary money issues. We will find a dependable insulated van that keeps the juices cold and dry without ice, more room so we don't have to bungee cord strap everything down and better gas mileage to reach all of San Diego.
Potential options below:
Chevrolet Express, 2009, 15,876 miles, $20,995
Chevrolet Express, 2013, 16,316 miles, $35,850 
GMC Savana, 2014, 254 miles, $34,550
Ford E250, 2013, 7,500 miles, $33,500
Local Delivery
We want to be San Diego's New Age Milkman and deliver weekly six packs and cleanses right to your door in insulated carriers so you have FRESH, ORGANIC, COLD-PRESSED, RAW juice all week long!  Do you remember getting fresh milk in glass bottles delivered right to your doorstep? Well its 2015 and it's time we bring back a little old school convenience with some new age health involved. Leave your empties and get fresh refills, sounds like you have no more excuses to not take care of yourself! 
Shipping
With the completion of the new production facility we will roll out shipping to our clients on a regional level and then sooner after nationally once we meet a consistent amount of orders to keep the rates low. With custom insulated boxes, dividers and ice packs we've found a way to get cold-pressed juice in glass shipped in a speedy transition right to your door. That means whether you desire a monthly cleanse or a weekly fulfillment, you will receive it fresh and in an efficient cost effective way.
Transparent Production Facility & Tasting Room
We want to share the experience of juicing with you through our one of a kind tasting room! Instead of going to a brewery or wine cellar to detect the notes of different spirits, make a healthy decision to visits the Country's first interactive kitchen. Imagine sitting down to the bar where all you find are healthy tonic shots, green juice and healthy happy hour appetizers while watching everything made right in front of you.  We want to create a space where people can come take care of themselves while learning more about the process of juicing and the benefits of incorporating more organic whole foods. This visually stimulating experience will be energizing and eventful for all ages. 
In It To Win It!
We've saved up over the last 8 months at the markets and with our own personal savings to buy the following: 
3 double door fridges- $8,000, Craigslist & Webstaurant online store 
Juicers- $35,000, Ebay & GoodNature 
Kitchen small ware- $8,500, SD Restaurant Supply 
Coolers- $1,050 Lowes, Home Depot
Marketing Material- EZ Up tents, tables, banners, decor etc. - $4,800
2003 Astro Van- $4,000, Good Ol' Craigslist 
The truth of the matter is that we save and save, we keep putting money back into the company, almost 80k has come out of pocket to attend the markets and get the machinery needed to simply provide juice for the community, but it took us month after month to do so. We've deferred school loans and made many personal sacrifices and now we've hit a roadblock that can't wait another year for us to save. This is why we really need everyone to help us reach economies of scale so we aren't forced to give up on how far we've come ourselves.
Education is very important to us at OH! Juice. We want our clients to make informed decisions around their purchases and be in the know about what they are putting into their bodies. Nutrition and health are often ignored and given very little attention in our country. Sadly this has lead to a sick, tired over weight population who feels defeated.  We know this can all be reduced by a good diet and regular exercise. Learning and knowing about the benefits of cold-pressed juicing and the healing capabilities of all the different nutrients that come in our juices motivates our clients more than if they were to buy it off a shelf. 
 Help us by sharing OH! Juice with any and everyone!
Know someone who would be just as stoked as you are about OH! Juice? Share our campaign with them through the "Share this project" button at the top or below. Sharing is caring!
Aside from the mental and physical demands, there's something deep down that tells us it's not over, with our expertise we believe it's our jobs to provide what the people need. We couldn't imagine our clients lives without our products and services, waking up to check our emails and not reading the messages that say we've changed their lives, we couldn't imagine saying good-bye to OH! Juice and everyone who is a part of it. Please help us reach our goals and spread the benefits of a genuine product that won't compromise it's core values for dollar signs! Anything you can do to help us stay afloat and thrive is greatly appreciated! 
Sold out, but we want to make more!
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Obstacle 1: We've always have had to throttle sales because people fell in love so quickly with the product and what it did for them that we gained immediate traction. Since then we've been solely focused on building the infrastructure around the model to sustain our current level of demand. After the infrastructure is built (kitchen, machinery and van) we will then need to switch gears into sales! We've been reworking our current sales manuals, but we will need to use our leadership and coaching skills to pass down the knowledge we carry to our employees. Honestly sales come very natural for both Anna and I because we believe in the product, know it inside in out, are great with people, and only sell the right thing to the buyer. 

The challenge will be hiring and training the right people for our team. We've employed 2-3 sales reps in the last 8 months but there was never a tight watch on them because again sales kind of just walked through the door for us, now we will need to refine everyones techniques and lead by example for our current and new employees. We're confident that the strong infrastructure will free up time in the kitchen and will allow us to concentrate more heavily then we already do on current customer out reach and acquiring new clients-can't wait!!!! 

We currently work with a PR agency, Olive PR Solutions. They have been one of the best things that has happened to us since we've started, they had an interest in our juice and were willing to do TRADE to develop a relationship. I know they will be excited to hear that they can do what they do best and let the floodgates open, where as before we had them helping with branding holding back not on exposure to throttle the sales to a level at which we could handle. 

Obstacle 2: I can see ourselves facing expansion in 3 quarters after we fund our project and seeing the opportunity to open our 2nd location. This first project's model is so tight and has a lot of traction already that once the infrastructure is there our model will look even better to expand. As young entrepreneurs we will need to face the legalities, juggling, and managing our first business AND opening our second OH! Juice!

We are very resourceful and believe that we will be able to do this simply because we are in it to win it, we are not the type of entrepreneurs who want to hit a hockey puck model and go lay on a beach somewhere, we know for the next 10 plus years it's going to be hard work day in and day out. This mindset is the foundation to multitask with high spirits and start sharing our knowledge and recipes around juicing and healthy food to other parts of the country! We have strict core values and by no means plan to compromise those for a franchise or to just open as many as we can, we have a clear vision and each of its own will be just as local and meet the high standards of quality as our first OH! Juice.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
MISSED THE KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN?
VISIT: WWW.FLUXMOB.COM 
IT'S YOUR LAST CHANCE TO GET BOLT² AT A SPECIAL PRICE:
PRE-ORDER HERE
After the support and success of delivering our first Kickstarter project on schedule, we’re here to introduce the next member of the BOLT family.
As a direct result of your feedback we were able to incorporate the features that you wanted most. We DOUBLED the capacity to 6000mAh and added a SECOND USB port but most importantly, MORE THAN DOUBLED the output to 2.4A. This means that you now have the ability to charge your phones and tablets up to 4x faster than a regular USB port! We were able to do all of this doubling while keeping it down to LESS THAN DOUBLE the size of our original.
Just like the original, BOLT² is an upgrade from your standard wall charger. Why carry around anything else when you can have a wall charger AND battery backup in one compact device? Whether you’re charging your device on the wall or on the go, BOLT² seamlessly integrates into your everyday life ensuring that you’ll never run out of battery again.
 BOLT² currently only supports US plugs, but it can be used internationally with a simple plug adapter for your region. We also have an international plug adapter kit available on our website.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Though we’ve done it before, bringing a product from the drawing board to reality is not an easy task. We’ve been fortunate enough to have the funds available to create production ready samples and obtain certifications. All that remains is to raise enough money so that we can greenlight the factory and begin production. With that said, there are always unforeseen events that can happen, especially when dealing with a factory that’s half a world away. We wouldn’t bring this to Kickstarter if we weren’t completely confident that we could get our project delivered to backers on schedule.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

Once you receive your tracking number, please allow 24-48 hours (most likely less) for your package to scan in and update.
Questions?

Surveys
We've got the majority of survey responses, but we still have a few stragglers out there. If you haven't filled out your survey, please take a couple minutes to complete it. We are nearing the final stages of production and we need your responses to finalize everything.

updates.update_userinfo: Select your BOLT² and Production is Underway!
updates.update_content:
Backerkit Surveys
Setup your shipping address, choose the color of your BOLT² and even add extra BOLTs and accessories using Backerkit. The invitations are going out shortly, so just check your inbox and follow the super simple instructions to make your selections. If you have any questions at all feel free to email us directly at info@fluxmob.com and we'll get you an answer quickly.
Production Update

Thank You!
Once again, you guys have gone above and beyond and we want to thank each and every one of our 2,030 backers for not only supporting our kickstarter but also for making it such a huge success. You guys are awesome and we owe it all to you! Thank you, thank you, thank you.
What's Next?

One Week Left! 
We're nearing the end of the campaign and everything looks like we're on schedule to deliver on time. We received a finalized sample of the pouch. Check it out:

Stretch Goal Announcement: Travel Case
We received over 100 votes for your choice of stretch goal and almost half of the votes were for the tailored travel case. We reached out to our factory last week and had a sample made to make sure we get the dimensions just right. We've left enough space to squeeze a short cable inside as well. We're still working on the final color and material options, but we're thinking along the lines of gray/black. Here's a photo of the sample below.

Stretch Goal Ideas
We'll be announcing our stretch goal once we hit 72k in funding. We're almost there, but we're pretty confident that we can hit this goal with your help. Right now we have three potential stretch goal ideas.
Soft zipper travel case tailored specifically for BOLT²

Packaging Design
We've received our first round of packaging design and wanted to share it with all of you. The overall packaging will be a white box with a flip down door on the inside and a slide out cover will wrap around the outside. What do you think?

By the way, all the external USB batteries that I've used can either be charged via USB, or charge a connected device at once: not both of them at once. Not sure what this kind of feature is called (simultaneous self-charge and discharge?), but would Bolt2 support this kind of operation?

campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
The first prototypes were crafted by hand, and their numerous parts tested for efficient operation. We are now in contact with various suppliers for the production of individual parts and with a network of international shippers to ensure we will be able to make deliveries by our deadline.

The process of taking a technical device from prototype to mass production is involved. Unexpected situations may arise due to a supplier missing a deadline, for example, or technical problems of the supply chain for the mass production. This can cause a deadline not being met.

We have prepared ourselves as best as possible for these unforeseen situations. If it really comes to a delay in the testing, production or supply of Blue Freedom, the backers will be informed immediately.

Remember, if we don't reach our goal we won't get funded, and no one will get to use Blue Freedom. So please, share our campaign with your friends and family!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
We are currently travelling around the world to set up serial production. We have been to China until yesterday and are very happy with the results.

Hi backers,
Our engineering team had a big meeting today. The manufacturing process is currently going according to the plan. We have almost finished the final concept molds for Blue Freedom. We have also started with detailed electrical engineering. In about two weeks we will be able to buy the first parts to build the hydropower plants after we have opened the new bank account with J.P. Morgan Chase.
